I was skeptical because of some of the reviews, but mine has worked well for the week since Ive had it, no rust and hasnt exploded lol", "Its small, so doesnt take up space and boils water quicker than a pot on the stove. You wont be disappointed in this product!"

I am enjoying using this for our pour-over coffee and for my loose black tea.  It works great!  I love the automatic shut-off feature as opposed to my last one that had a whistle.  I am not completely a fan of stainless appliances in that they show fingerprints, etc. Being in the kitchen, it is hard to keep it spotless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Kettle of All online Kettles
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS KETTLE!  It is compact, cord stores away, inside is completely enclosed so protected against rust, heats in minutes, shuts inself off - and the kettle comes off the heating base to easily fill and pour. Also the PRICE - it was the least expensive and I received an additional discount as a Prime Member and this was my first AmazonBasics purchase.  I will go to AmazonBasics FIRST next time I need an appliance.  Thanks!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast and Easy Way to Make My Tea
reviews.reviewText: "I had a few instances recently where Id forgotten I put water in the tea kettle on the stove and didnt hear the kettle screaming because I had left the room.  That scared me into buying this electric kettle with an automatic shutoff.  I really like it.  Its fast and convenient and safe.  I wish it had temperature control as the water comes to a rolling boil but hey, it did the same thing in the stove kettle, so thats no different.  I also would prefer that the lid not be attached so that it would be a little easier to access the inside to clean but thats also not been a problem.  Im happy with it."

Did I mention that this was fast.  We used it recently to boil the water for spaghetti.  We used 3 potfuls and added them to the pot.  It was much faster than boiling a pot of water on the stove.  I make tea and use this kettle exclusively.  My wife uses the kettle to heat the water for her french press.

"I bought my first kettle to make French press coffee.  Its boils quickly and shuts off automatically when it should. It worked so well I bought one for my son and his family.  In addition to French press coffee, theyre also big tea drinkers.  My daugher-in-law says she loves it.  Id highly recommend this kettle"

reviews.reviewTitle: I LOVE THIS LITTLE ELECTRIC TEA POT
reviews.reviewText: "This pot is understated beauty - it has no overload of bells and whistles, just fill it easily with water, check the easily visible full water line to make sure you havent overfilled, flip the switch, and in a flash you have boiling water.  this is the kind of electrical appliance I Love - simple - easy- and does its job!"

Read the instructions before using, then do as described and it works perfectly. Bought it for my dorm room, as I’m a big tea drinker. I heat it up at least 2 to 3 times a day and haven’t run into any issues yet. The metal looks nice and you can easily switch it on. It is quite small tough! I wouldn’t buy it to provide the whole family or office with hot water, but for personal use it’s awesome.

My wife is a coffee drinker but she likes her hot tea also. This is a great hot water kettle. It has a nice heft and looks right at home on the kitchen counter. It heats water to a boil very fast, then shuts off automatically. The heating element is in the kettle, not the base with the cord. I used the kettle to heat water for iced tea as well. I have purchased several AmazonBasics items and have been pleased with all of them.

I bought this for my 88 year old mom. Her other tea kettle broke while heating water on the stove. It was glass and probably made for a coffee maker. This stainless steel kettle now sits on her counter plugged into the socket and is much safer. She told me she loves it. It is fast too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty good if you’re not a coffee snob
reviews.reviewText: This product is pretty good. Looks nice, fairly quick. Easy to keep clean if just using water. However for me where it loses one star is where I’m a coffee snob. It boils the water a little too hot for French press coffee and the coffee tastes a little burned. Sure I could wait a few minutes to let the water cool but who has time for that?

reviews.reviewTitle: slightly smaller size works great for us
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my Mom.  She was using an older tea kettle for the top of the stove, and it held a lot of water, which made it heavy for her to lift.  This kettle is the perfect size and holds plenty of water for many cups of instant coffee or for tea.  It works beautifully, and with the larger opening, it makes it easy to clean.  Love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice size with a small footprint
reviews.reviewText: "Although most have twice the capacity (at twice the cost or more),  Im not sure why I would need nearly 2 liters of boiling water for a cup or two of tea.  You dont get the floor show of a clear glass ones with the blue light, although the window is fairly large - but you do get 1/2 to 1 liter of boiling water pretty fast."

reviews.reviewTitle: Good looking and inconspicuous in a small space.
reviews.reviewText: Holds more than it looks, inconspicuous on a very small kitchen counter, easy to use, I love it after my Merck died after six months .

I have always thought I had no need for instant hot water but boy was I wrong. This is great for herbal tea, soups (ramen!) and multiple other uses. Wish I had bought enough one a long time ago and this one is perfect because it doesn’t take up much room on the counter. Nothing not to love!

The reason why i gave 3 stars is that it’s hard to refill it & watch the full level.The tip lid doesn’t open wide enough. I use filtered water & im right handed. Makes it very difficult to pour the water around the lid & see water level underneath., It does work well & heats the water quickly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Inside lining starts to chip only after a couple of weeks
reviews.reviewText: "This product does a really good job of heating up my water within 3 minutes, BUT after a couple of weeks of use, the bottom inside lining has started to chip. This is very concerning to me since the residue from the chipping is getting into the water. Thus, I dont recommend this product since I dont think its safe to consume water with residue from the chipping."

"This was one of those perfect finds - exactly what I needed at a great price. It heats the max water in 4-5 minutes to a rolling boil. I only leave it for 2-3 minutes because boiling is too hot for me. The on/off switch is large and easy to use. Its attractive - a bit retro - and has a nice small footprint."

reviews.reviewTitle: how did I live with out this?
reviews.reviewText: "First the kettle is great the price is great. It sits on the counter with my french coffee press and box of tea and right next to the faucet. It is always ready and very speedy, how great is that. But that is not all it is also great for making jello! who knew boiling water so quick! This is my first tea kettle.  I have only had it a few weeks so I cant rate durability but at the price not sure I care if it does not last a year."

reviews.reviewTitle: Plastic that touches hot boiling water.
reviews.reviewText: Looking for plastic-free  Plastic measurement unit touches water on this unit. Don’t know why I didn’t see this before buying. Returned.

Replaced my larger kettle with this smaller one, which does an excellent job at doing what its supposed to do.....heat water., After a year, I usually replace my kettles since they gradually become noisy in use over time....still work fine...but noisy., This smaller one does a fine job and quietly.....

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils water fast, metal gets hot, though
reviews.reviewText: "I bought this to bring with me traveling so I can have tea wherever Im staying and it works great! It boils water very fast and the base doesnt get too hot. The metal kettle, however, does get pretty hot so be careful not to touch it! I usually rinse it under the faucet and it cools back down quickly so I can pack it back up."

"You need one of these if you dont want to bother with boiling water in a pot or tea kettle.  Its super efficient and a good size for serving at least four cups of tea.  Its QUICK too.  I really like mine and if it ever breaks I will need to replace it with the same thing.  A kitchen must-have."

reviews.reviewTitle: I would buy this again. It is great for my arthritic hands because it’s easy to pour.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this kettle!  Other kettles were too big. I need it for a couple cups of tea, for just my husband and myself. It is so fast!  It’s a perfect size to have on the counter, next to my toaster. I wish there was a way to make it whistle when it starts to boil., I don’t know if any electric kettle does that.

Changed my life. All my life I have been doing it the old fashion way. Fill up a pot with water, put it on the stove, wait three excruciating minutes. Just like my mom, grandma and great grandma. So old school. Looking forward to the new Bob, the Bob with two extra exciting minutes every morning. Two extra minutes to do such things as write a review about a coffee pot. Look out world, here I come.

The built is really basic and not much of fancy function. It gets the job down if you just need it for the hot water, tea, or coffee. Material is a meh to be honest but you get what you pay for. The window for the water level is plastic. According to the website, it says BPA free. I guess I gotta choose to trust Amazon’s product. It does get hot for the plastic part. The body itself will be hot so def keeps it away from children.

This kettle came with rust stains, however I contacted amazon and they gave me a refund. They offered to replace it also but I preferred not to because it would be the same poor kettle. I expected better from an amazon product. I did scrub it and I use it from time to time but I plan to invest in a better quality kettle.

This kettle works great.  It is well designed.  Heating water is fast and easy.  Fill with water.  Push the start button.  Wait a few minutes.  Viola.  Hot water.  Not sure it can be any easier.  The quality is good.  And at the price the value is very high.

For a cheap electric kettle this one does its job well. It doesn’t have any features other then turn it on and it boils the water then turns off by itself. If you want a basic electric kettle this is the product for you. I use it daily and have been for several months now and I have had no issues.

Had this kettle a little over a year and the bottom started peeling and flaking which ended up in my tea.  Of course I can’t return this now.  Don’t recommend this for any long term or short for that matter, waste of money!

reviews.reviewTitle: Small Capcity footprint but works well
reviews.reviewText: "I was concerned about comments stating top did not open wide enough.  I dont see a problem at all.  Overall the unit is much smaller than I anticipated but works fine for 1-2 people.  Heats very fast and trouble free.  Small footprint takes up less counter space.  Quite happy with my purchase."

"I love this water kettle, it boils water super fast and doesnt taste weird like some other water kettle I used before. Also it kept the water warm for a long time when I kept the water inside, which surprised me because it doesnt have a keep warm feature."

Fantastic kettle! I didn’t have high hopes for this kettle, but it was only $16, so I thought I’d give it a try. Yes, as others have noted, it is quite loud. However, it heats up extremely quickly! It is 1500 Watts, compared to most others that are 1000 to 1200 Watts. In fact, it took 4 minutes, on the dot, to boil 1000ml. The other issue I have is that the button to start is a little funky. Oddly, the kettle has to be in a certain position on the base for the lever to stay down. All that to say, though, I would recommend this kettle.

Great kettle for all your hot water needs. I use it for tea and the instant stuff like coffee and miso soup. Super easy to use with a push of the button and the auto shutoff feature is handy. It also is super quick with only a few minutes before you get hot water., All in all great buy if you are looking for a kettle for your hot water needs.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, easy to clean and heats water quickly
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to clean and heats water quickly. I also love that the kettle is separate from heating plate the plugs into the wall, making it easy to fill the kettle or pour it away from the outlet (the last one I owned, had a plug that went directly from kettle to outlet so it had to be unplugged every time I filled the kettle which was really annoying).

French press for coffee, herbal tea in the evening, oatmeal in the morning, boiled eggs anytime., "This boiler is so fast, convenient and energy efficient youll be very happy with your purchase, we use this probably 3 times a day"

reviews.reviewTitle: One can get burned very easily and very bad by using it!
reviews.reviewText: The item is getting much to hot. One can get burned very easily and very bad by using it!

"What a great little kettle.  I love that theres an auto shut off.  I cant tell you how many kettles Ive burned on the stove because I feel asleep.  Sometimes the whistle doesnt wake you!  Anyways...the little spout filter is nice too. Water gets super hot.  I even use it for ramen."

"Heats up water really quickly. Wish the cord was longer, just not enough length for a lower wall socket. Will probably buy a power strip for it. The top that pops open could make cleaning a little hard if you tried to put something in there that wasnt water, but I imagine boiling a full kettle would clean it just fine."

"My husband likes to prep his Yeti with hot water before pouring his coffee in. He had a cheap, ugly electric kettle from years ago. I couldnt stand to look at it. Now he has a cheap, pretty electric kettle and all is well in our marriage. Works great, looks great, and its very affordable. So worth it."

I use this for my French Press and to make hot teas. I can not recommend this enough! Already planning on ordering a second one for my office., This electric kettle makes my .5L hot in under a minute so I am not rushing in the morning. I quickly fill it and turn it on while I grind my coffee and it is ready before I need it.

"Brings a half liter to a boil in just over 2 minutes at 6500 above sea level. Ive had it over a year and it still works great with no leaks, and it doesnt leak or drip when pouring into a mug.  I would prefer a kettle that does not incorporate plastic into the main chamber, but overall I really like the design and usability."

Gets the water from not boiling to boiling. Full pot (2L) takes about 8 minutes from cold to done. I wish it had some sort of more noticeable sound when done. The on lever is very quiet when it pops back up.

"I was so excited for the rating of this kettle. But after 3-4 months of regular use, it just wont turn back on. It is past the 90 days window so I dont have an option to return / get help, but now Im stuck with a kettle that just _wont_ work. I would so much rather have spent a little more and gotten an instrument that would have lasted longer !"

Love this...it is actually faster than boiling water in the microwave and is safe as well. I am almost looking forward to the cooler evenings of Fall and Winter when I like to make a cup of tea. It will be faster and easier!

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent quality but not easy to refill
reviews.reviewText: This product looks nice but the steel seems thin and the design is a little cheap.  Mine does not sit on the base evenly it is wobbly.  But it does it’s trick. The lid also does not open wide so it is difficult to refill this product without using a cup to refill it.

I bought this pot and it looks great. the material finish seems to be of a high quality. It heats water quickly. However, he lid only open to about 60 from the horizontal. This makes filling the pot awkward and cleaning the inside very difficult. Otherwise, I like this pot

This kettle has fantastic build quality and feels very heavy and solid in your hand. Heats a good quantity of water up in a very short amount of time, making it my go-to for prepping water for tea or for coffee with my french press. The auto-shutoff feature is reliable and convenient.

reviews.reviewTitle: It turns on, it heats, it turns off. What else do you need?
reviews.reviewText: "No need for bells and whistles. Its morning. I want coffee. It helps."

I use this in my classroom.  It does not take up much space on my shelf.  I use a larger kettle at home, but this is the perfect size for work.  Yes, my students can hear when it is heating up water, but it is quieter and more durable than the more expensive kettle I have at home.  I use this kettle multiple times daily and have never had any issues with it.

I had bought a new one for my studio, and I love it. So I got a discounted one for the house, that was "like new", (with damaged packaging).  It\s perfect.  It\s made of steel. So much quicker, and more energy efficient than the stove top tea kettle, and shuts itself off. When you put a cup into the microwave, it\s hard to tell the time needed. It could boil over if too long, depending on the thickness of ceramic mug, and how much liquid, shape of the mug... it could make a huge difference., "Its the most valuable appliance I have."

I use this daily for my hot water needs in making tea.  Water is HOT, cleanup is easy.  Love the stainless pot.  In use for the past 8 months.  yes it is noisy, but the water is boiling hot.  The 1 liter capacity makes enough for several nice cups of tea.

reviews.reviewTitle: Was given as a gift. She loves, loves, loves it!!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for a friend at Christmas because she liked mine so much and she loves it. She had an older version of an electric kettle that was larger and heavier. She prefers the small go over her old one. Smaller in size but functions the same and heats up very quickly. She thinks me monthly for this gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Probably the best thing I bought on Amazon
reviews.reviewText: "This is my first electric kettle and I had put off purchasing this for so long. I do not regret it. Its extremely fast in heating up water, and no longer do I have to boil hot water in a pot for tea anymore. Simple and awesome and works well for just one person."

reviews.reviewTitle: This is as easy to use as could be wanted and heats water ...
reviews.reviewText: "This is as easy to use as could be wanted and heats water very quickly. I make my coffee in either a French press or drip coffee with a cone, and I use this kettle for the task. Ive not been disappointed yet."

reviews.reviewTitle: "Water smelled a little off the first few times. Its small. Works fine."
reviews.reviewText: "I didnt realize how small this was compared to my last electric kettle. Also, there is a small plastic window to see inside and after the first few uses, the water smelled a little chemically. I wouldnt use the water with this unit after the first few boils. After boiling a very full pot of water a few times and thourghly cleaning the inside, the water no longer smells. Im not much of a plastic conspiracy theorist, so I still use it, but if you are very persnickety about your water quality Id probably skip it."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great but maybe not as durable as it should be
reviews.reviewText: It’s  great for the money and it heats up pretty quickly. However, I bought it back a few months ago and the part that helps lift the lid broke, meaning I had to open the lid manually. I asked Amazon about it and they gave me a new one and I didn’t even have to send my defective one back which was very convenient. Hope that was just a fluke and this will last me quite a while.

At first I was apprehensive, the price is just too cheap and the reviews are just too good., Well...this inexpensive kettle is great and I’m getting rid of my Ninja and Keuring., Good coffee has to be hot and this little kettle heats the water a lot better and faster than either the Ninja or Keuring and yes, the coffee is great and stays hot., This is not just a good buy but a great buy., Enjoy!

"This little kettle is perfect for my needs. It heats quickly and I only need to fill it to the first level. I previously had a larger kettle but only filled it part way and it seemed to take forever to get to a boil. It also pitted very badly on the interior and I couldnt wash that away. On top of that it cost almost twice as much as this one. I have been using a Tea Forte selection of herbal teas that are delicious and have no caffeine. This is important to me because I like to drink tea in the evening and they dont interfere with sleep. The tea is available from Amazon."
Great little kettle!  Forgot how much better tea is when you use the correct water temperature., Handy, easy to operate, easy to see what the water level is at all times.  Nice little unit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for 1-2 people and heard fast
reviews.reviewText: "I bought this for the small size and the fact that it is not plastic. Its fantastic, and I love that you can lift it right off the base! Cord storage is awesome to keep my counters less cluttered. But keep in mind that, like all kettles, this kettle starts to make boiling noises before the water cones to a complete boil. Check the window to make sure its boiling."

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect electric kettle at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I went to Europe and noticed that almost every home had an electric kettle. I did not know how useful these were until I started using them! I know use them all the time and they are especially helpful if you are feeling sick and need a quick peppermint tea. This kettle from amazonbasics has exceeded my expectations. It is made of stainless steel, which cleans very easily. Would definitely recommend!

I can’t believe how fast this heats up water! I can’t give it 5 stars for temperature control because there isn’t a way to read the temp. But I do it by listening. When it’s just heating up it’s very warm not hot and if you let it go it will boil...be close by though- it is speedy!

I liked the size and design, but after the first boil there were spots at the bottom of the pot. I’ve used glass and stainless steel tea kettles before and these spots definitely do not look like normal residue.

Love this kettle.  Heats up fast with auto off.  Keeps water warm after auto off.  Nice capacity for 2 people but heats up fast for more.  Love the stainless steel.  Looks and works great in my kitchen .

This kettle has been in use for the last ten months - and being in a British, tea-addicted household, it sees heavy use!, "There werent many choices for a 1-ltr metal kettle - especially not at this price. A good buy."
"The quality of this product is way above its price point. The downside is that I used to have time after I ground my coffee to prepare my cats food. Now I dont this heats water incredibly fast."

"Have been using for about a year in my office. The main reason, coffee shops dont boil the water - at least, I couldnt get a response to my question about that, so...i boil my water myself. Works reliably and consistently."
"OMG I was able to boil water for 3 cups for tea in a minute. Our family has tea in the evening but nobody wanted to stand over the stove waiting for water to boil. Its no nonsense kettle."

reviews.reviewTitle: Tested in workplace. Bought one for daughter.
reviews.reviewText: We have one at work used by quite a few people.  It heats quickly and turn auto off. I was very impressed so i bought one for my daughter in college who keeps it at the student-body office with her and makes tea constantly.  I plan to buy another soon for my other daughter.

I love this! I use it almost everyday! No more waiting for boiling water from the stove! Perfect temperature water in a few minutes! I use this for tea, I use this for hot chocolate, I use this for instant breakfast, I use this at any chance I get!

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, Quick, and Easy to Use Kitchen Counter Boiler
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as part of my new Bodum French Press Coffee Maker and am loving it. Boils water in several minutes, and cools off to place in a strainer after a few more minutes. Perfect size for the Bodum 1-Liter Coffee Maker. Makes 4-5 cups of coffee.
Cool tap water (not room temp) took about 3:45 mins., About 1/2 fill took about 2 mins., It is a bit louder than you may expect when the water starts to heat., Overall a good buy!
Bought this a week ago and used it maybe 5 times until it stopped working. I’ll turn it on and the light will turn on, but then it won’t boil water.

Bought this for making single cups of water for tea and have been very happy with the speed and ease of use.  Since I am only heating the water, I generally just empty it and it is still hot enough to evaporate any water left in it, so cleanup is a breeze.  I really like the base.  The base plugs into the wall and you just sit the filled kettle on the base and flip the little button on the side and it boils the water for you.  No cords to the kettle so you can pick it up and take it where you want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Less than a month, showing staining
reviews.reviewText: "Ive had it for less than a month, and its already showing slight wear on the outside. Its also really loud. For a college student though, I dont mind it for the price I paid, although I still lust after my mothers Hamilton kettle. Not bad, not great. Just average."

"I use it to boil water for coffee and tea, for which it works like a charm. I wish the lid was removable for cleaning, and it would have been nice to be able to control the temperature more precisely than boiling or not boiling. Still, for the price, if you just want to boil water, its tough to beat."

Love it! Heats water within 60 seconds Works magic with my french press and instant oatmeal much quicker than using the microwave and heat temp is long lasting. Use with caution water does get extremely hot!  I spilled coffee on myself and got a horrible burn.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little kettle for the money
reviews.reviewText: Quiet, easy to use, and safe. I love the auto-off feature, and the kettle feels rather secure on the base. It boils very quickly and I appreciate that it has the filter. Small enough to be unobtrusive and blends in nicely in my office.
Not sure why I hadn’t purchased this before. So much faster than boiling water on the stove. Good size. Happy with purchase. Only have it a couple of days. Hopefully it’s durable.

I was a little put off by the size as I was expecting something bigger but then I probably should have read the description better. It is a liter.  Its compact and fits very nicely where my old kettle sat but since it is smaller it heats up much faster than my old one and the stainless finish works well to clean up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quickly comes to a boil and shuts off.
reviews.reviewText: "I am really enjoying this Kettle. I cant believe it brings water to boil so rapidly. I use it for more than just beverages. I use it to bring water to boil then pour it in a pan for Ramen, Oatmeal, Lentils or anything like that."
Nice little kettle for the price, I like the transparent window on the side. My only complaint is a little bit of rust buildup around the handle, make sure you keep this thing dry on the outside.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quick kettle except for a little awkward to fill.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first electric kettle I\ve owned; I\ve really enjoyed them when I\ve been in Europe and finally decided to pull the trigger. I spent a lot of time reading reviews making my choice, reading reviews, and this one seemed the best bang for the buck. I\ve had it about a week and so far so good. It boils quickly. I typically boil around .5L, the "minimum", which takes 2 minutes to come to a full boil that activates the auto-shut off. It starts to bubble at 1.5 minutes. The auto shut-off works like a charm. The on/off lever lights up when the kettle in on and clicks off when the water reaches full boil. The light is large enough to be sign but not large enough to be obnoxious (some of these seem to moonlight as Barbie\s Dream Disco). The handle does not get hot to the touch. There\s also a small black disc on the lid that you can use to close it (if you\re peeking at it before it auto shuts off ) that also does not get hot to the touch. I got this kettle partly because it was smaller, just 1L versus a more typical 1.7L, thinking it would take up less room on my counter. However, I actually think the larger capacity kettles are just taller, not necessarily wider. A friend got me one for a gift (after I had already ordered this one) and even though it\s 1.7 L, it looks to be about the same size. The kettle isn\t large, just not significantly smaller than one with almost twice the capacity. The bottom has a place to wrap excess cord which works well enough. The only real downside to this kettle is that the lid does not open all the way, which makes it difficult to put in water from the faucet and to see how much you\re putting in bc you have to hold the kettle at an awkward angle to fill.

Love it, I had been looking for an electric kettle for a few months and finally bought this one. Took it out, ran the water though like suggested and it works great, I may give this as a gift to my family members who would also appreciate it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not fancy.  Basic, functional, and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: "Needed a small electric kettle for my home office area.  Couldnt justify a Keurig or similar for an occasional cup of tea, coffee, chocolate, etc.  This is a decent looking basic 1 liter kettle that works quickly and is perfect for an individual at an excellent price."

reviews.reviewTitle: A bit dribbly for pour over
reviews.reviewText: "Very clean, simple looking kettle, visually very attractive.  I use it to make pour over coffee and Ive found that it dribbles a lot when I try to pour slowly.  Other than that, every bit as good as the Krups weve used for years."
This kettle is small and efficient. If you fill to the max line (1 L), it boils in just a couple minutes. Perfect size for two.

reviews.reviewTitle: I practically use it twice a day!
reviews.reviewText: Got it as a gift and I’m happy with it! It warms up quick and shuts off after boiling. It doesn’t keep the water hot for long as it’s slightly open with the spout. So I make sure to steep the tea. Otherwise I’m happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very small, but perfect for camping trailers.
reviews.reviewText: "My only problem was my own mistake in ordering a kettle that was too small. Good news is Ive given it to my parents for their camper and they love it. Its a good product and well priced."

I had a kettle with a plug. it died. this one looks great and heats fast., only holds one litre, plenty for my morning coffee, would be nice to be able to take the top off to clean inside, but never buy one with a cord again
The shell will be hot,Everything else is fine.

I’m using this electric tea kettle in my classroom (kids like to eat cup ramen and if they bring their own cups I let them make tea), and it’s really user-friendly. Just fill up to the max line, press the button down, and when the button changes colors it’s done! The water comes out really hot too. I haved noticed after a little while of using it, heat spots have formed at the bottom of the kettle on the inside....but no one is sees that and doesn’t change the quality of the heated water. Pretty awesome for the price! It’s the cheapest electric kettle I could find that wouldn’t break the bank!

"I dont have air conditioner and every time I want to make coffee or tea I have to use my gas stove and my house gets even hotter... this electric kettle has been a life saver. Not only does it boil water way faster than the stove top but it doesnt make my house unbearably hot every time I want coffee or tea. So glad I bought this. Perfect size for my small counter, too."

I have one at home, one at the office, and I just bought one for my son. These work completely as advertised. They boil water quickly, don’t add and flavor and hold up to daily repetitive use. For 20 bucks this is an absolute no-brained.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great while it lasted but not sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this little pot while we were on vacation. It was just what we neeed. Sadly The airline broke the creap plastic holding the base together so it is now useless paperweight!

reviews.reviewTitle: This kettle works great to make a few cups of tea
reviews.reviewText: This kettle works great to make a few cups of tea., The heating is fairly quick and the cleanup is a breeze with the detachable base., "I havent kept it long enough to rely on the automatic shut-off feature.", "The plastic water gauge works well for me, and for the price it cant be beat."
The best water pot ever, so fast to boil water at no time just press button then there you have coffee or hot tea or even for quick cooking, very useful and the best.

I’ve only had a couple weeks but I use it every day for tea and I stand coffee. It’s a perfect size and very clean and sleek looking. I can’t speak too well to durability but it seems very good quality to others I’ve owned in the past.

I use this everyday multiple times a day and love it. I upgraded from a cheap plastic version & this is perfect. Holds the same amount of water, I don’t have to worry about an annoying cord, and it’s fast. 11/10 would recommend if you are looking for a standard electric tea kettle.
The life of this product is longer than $40 electrical hot water kettle.  I am still using it!

This might just be my fault, but i thought it would be quiet enough to have in my office but it is really loud, gonna have to put in my office but it proved to be too loud to not cause a disturbance to my colleagues. Makes a lot of noise
I got this after a recent trip to Ireland where there was one in my hotel room.  Heats water quickly and relatively quietly.  Love having hot water quickly!

reviews.reviewTitle: Use it several times a day.
reviews.reviewText: This gets used several times a day in our home. Quickly brings water to boil and looks nice on the counter.  We had a larger kettle, but this size is really all we need for the 4 of us and doesn’t take up so much space on the counter.

"I dont know why I waited so long to finally purchase an electric kettle. My husband and I have been drinking a ton of tea during this never-ending winter and microwaving water was getting old. We are loving how quickly this kettle heats the water. The automatic shut off is great for when we get sidetracked. The base is separate from the kettle, which makes for easy and safe cleaning. I may have to get a second one to keep at work."

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t buy, plastic particles from lining get in water
reviews.reviewText: This product is horrible and I’m sure it’s leeching plastic into the hot water. Every time I heat up water, there are particles floating in it. I think it has to do with the plastic seal around the window and I’m pissed I can’t return this. Don’t buy this. Get one that’s made out of glass or something.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and heats water well
reviews.reviewText: I owned one of this tea kettles for a while and I love it. Water is heated super fast. By the time I get my tea bad and mug ready, the water is ready to go. I loge it that it turns off by itself too. Great safety mechanism. I love it so much I gifted one to my mom for her birthday. Easy to clean too. I use filter water from my fridge so water is cold and it heats super fast.

"I use this electric water kettle every morning. Its compact size takes up little room and heats up water quickly. The opening at the top of the kettle is a little small to be putting your hand in to clean it. Once water comes to a boil the kettle automatically shuts off.", Improvement suggestions - adding a temperature control would be great, but for $20 its not something I would expect to be on this kettle.
We have been using this for almost two months and we love it! Great little electric kettle. Gets the job done quickly and doesn’t look bad on my counter! No issues at all.

"I need quality tea when I travel and hotel offerings are unreliable, not to mention the in-room device always has an unpalatable coffee tasting residue. Who knows whats been boiled in there?", "This little powerhouse boils quickly and takes up very little space in my luggage. Its proven very durable. Great purchase!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but loud for heating water.
reviews.reviewText: It works as expected and heats water very quickly. It makes enough water for a few cups of tea at a time. The only flaw in this product is how loud it is. I have a different brand at work and I never hear it. This brand can be heard from another room. Still a useful product and great for the price.

"I have used this kettle everyday since I received it. Its perfect for what I need, not to big heats up quickly. I like that the cord is not to long also.", If your looking for a simple kettle for 1-2 people this is a great choice.

I purchased on for my son in law for part of his Christmas last year.  When I was there visiting I used his.  I liked it so much I ordered another for me and a friend.  I you are making hot water for a large family it probably is too small. It is perfect for 2 to 4 cups of tea/coffee.  LOVE IT!!!

Great bang for your buck! I love this!, This kettle has not done me wrong., I use it on a daily business and it is proven to be durable and fast-brewing., If you are looking for a small kettle, I would deinfatley get this one., You cant beat the cost either!
A lovely little inexpensive kettle. It works well and is easy to keep clean.

We make a lot of tea around the house, especially when the in laws are over. My wife is always worried she left the gas stove on (but never does). Picked this up for her and we use it all the time. Quick to boil and shuts off on its own. Perfect!

Just got this guy! It’s awesome. I didn’t like having the tea kettle on the stove getting splattered by cooking endeavors and this is a way better option. Boils the water so quickly and shuts off as soon as it’s done. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can be dangerous due to unclear markings.
reviews.reviewText: "The max fill line should be more prominently outlined. Ive had several guests overkill past that line & when it boils it goes everywhere! Luckily nobody was in the kitchen when that happened, but I had to mop everywhere including the ceiling."

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats Up Fast and Stays Hot
reviews.reviewText: Very fast and stays hot—great value! Looks nice too. I concur with other reviewers about preferring to lose the plastic window, but am not about to pay 4x as much for the Oxo kettle.
Simple and efficient. A little loud when boiling but not too bad. Fairly easy to clean with a sponge, bottle brush struggles to get some areas due to the design.

"I needed a new electric kettle and did not want to spend too much. The AmazonBasics line of products has not let me down so far, so I gave it a shot. Its not the best, but obviously gets the job done."

I have had this for a couple of months now. This kettle is built without any extra nonsense. It does exactly what it promises: it boils water safely and quickly. It is still working perfectly, just like the day I got it.

"It boils water fine.  You click the little switch and it boils the water.  Theres no temperature control, or weird extra features, or anything like that.  You just click the switch and wait a minute, and the water boils.", Though it does turn itself off after that, at least.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality kettle,  hot on the outside
reviews.reviewText: "This kettle is of good quality. It has a nice and clean appearance, is easy to access/clean filter and to fill with water in a regular kitchen sink. I like how the cord wraps around under the base and stays put and out of the way. It is very convenient to have the kettle itself without a cord (the cord is in the base that you lift it from). The only thing I didnt like about this kettle is that the outside gets very hot to the touch (burns your skin), as to be expected with metal."

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well if you only need a little bit of hot water at a time.
reviews.reviewText: The only thing that I didn’t like is the small capacity. I thought it was big enough when I ordered it—but now I’m much happier with the OXO 60 ounce that I also bought through Amazon. It gets hot enough, but the OXO gets to a true roiling boil

reviews.reviewTitle: Saw this and SO glad I did
reviews.reviewText: First used one of these in Europe.  Decided it was time to get one for me (tired of waiting on the micro-wave or teapot).  Saw this and SO glad I did.  Boiling water in 60 seconds!!  (Local stores sell similar for $50 - save your money and buy this little pot.)

"After spending a few weeks in Europe, we wondered how we never had one of these at home. We use this item often for tea, French press, and pour over coffee. Very easy to clean, holds heat, and auto shutoff when water boils or pot is removed from base. Sides heat up, but bottom doesnt so you can set it down anywhere. Very good quality."
Perfect size for two mugs of tea or coffee. Or oatmeal, noodles, or any add boiling water to dish. Heats up quickly. Auto shut off if distracted and stays warm a long time. Great for home or camping.

"Bought since I was visiting my parents and I hated using microwave to heat water for myself. Mom didnt care for it when I told her but once it was here she liked it. Its compact and works well. Recommend 100%."
Took 4:36 to come to a full boil at sea level. Giving <5 stars for ‘easy to clean’ because I can’t get my hand in and move around to clean it—I need a brush w/handle.

"Boils a cup of cold tap water in 2 minutes. Base doesnt get hot -- heating element is internal to the kettle.", 9 month update: after nearly daily use, auto-off function failed, which has the potential to cause damage as described by some of the other reviews. Do not use unattended.
Quickly boils water within a minute and turns off once water has reached a boil. We use this daily to make coffee in our French press and couldn’t be happier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great capacity and heats up water to boiling temp so quick
reviews.reviewText: Works really well, heats up water to boiling temperatures so quick. I use boiling water to make tea with loose herbs. This flask works perfect for that.

Perfect for boiling water. I have used it daily for over a month. It takes no time at all to boil and automatically shuts off when done. I leave it open when done so it can air dry and not grow mold. It does have some noise but not enough to wake the family up in the morning.
"Exactly what I needed, incredibly simple, fast, and reliable. I love the easy-to-see measurements on the side so that you can just measure water as its poured in."
"I got this for a space saving tea kettle I didnt have to use our stove for. It works fine, does what it says and gives us enough water for several cups of tea. All in all, Im happy so far"

I bought this little kettle for my office about 3 months ago. I can get about two large cups of hot water out of it for my tea. It is easy to fill and relatively easy to clean if you are using a brush/wand that can reach into the kettle. The rim and lid angle is a bit small to reach my hand inside it. The only drawback is that when heating, the kettle is quite loud; much louder than a different electric kettle that I have at home.
I bought this for my husband in his rig.... is so durable,love that the plate on bottom is not attached so he can fill it easier. Heats well,  perfect size
This kettle started leaking from the underside of the spout after 13 months. It looks like the soldering corroded and the seam came apart.
I love this so much. It heats up very quickly and it shuts off when it reaches the temp. I don’t have to stand and watch it. It is fast and safe . I’ve had a few before but this one is perfect!

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great, works great (Body Gets Hot)
reviews.reviewText: "I was hesitant and was planning to buy a fancier Hot Water Kettle. I am glad I did not, this one looks really cool (retro) with nice construction. The body does gets hot - but come on its a hot water kettle :)"
The kettle is a great kit, and also helps me during the travel. Biggest issue is there is no protection over the body. It would be "extremely" hot when the water is just broiled.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works fine and fast as well
reviews.reviewText: "If you havent used an electric kettle, you should.  Nothing is easier to use when you need hot water.  In most of Europe and Australia the electric kettle is on every kitchen counter.  Try one and you will see why."
Wow, what a great product. High quality material. Durable. Boils water in seconds. Lightweight. Easy to carry. Compact. Awesome design. Best price!!!

"Quickly heats the water, easy to clean. Worth it. Only concern is theres a plastic cover inside to see water level which is getting contacted with the boiling water. Worried about the chance of plastic particles releases into water at high boiling temperatures."
Great for heating water for your French Press or instant soups. Fill it up push the button and it completely turns itself off after boiling. Faster then a stove top

Love this kettle!  It takes up almost no counter space because it\s small (about 5" diameter), but it\s mighty!  Boiling water so fast!  My Mom liked mine so much she got one of her own.  Highly recommend!

I use this product every day in my office at work. For someone who just wants to make a little boiled water for tea or instant noodles, this works perfectly! It doesn’t take up very much space on my desk either. There is no variable temperature control on it, but I don’t expect there to be for how cheap it is. It shuts off right after it starts boiling. I’ve never experienced any operational issues with it.
"it is the best price I could find on Amazon for kettle products. After a few months of usage, the lid broke off but the kettle is still working. After all, Im satisfied with the product."

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable kettle for those on a budget
reviews.reviewText: I bought this kettle because it is stainless steel and I’m on a budget, and you guys it’s the best it’s gets hot like it should and I love it I have a review about it on my YouTube channel crissyvalues.
I love this!!! I took it on vacation with me and had my hot French press coffee as soon as I woke up, in my room!!! I gave it to my son, and I ordered another one for me!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little Tea Pot and Super Quick!!!
reviews.reviewText: My nephew had this, my sister bought it because my nephew had it. I went to my sisters house they made me tea and it was super quick so I had to buy it. Buy it, it’s awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect to make hot water for anything.
reviews.reviewText: I love that it heated up so quickly. I used it for pouring hot water over instant coffee, tea bags and even Raman noodle soups. Very versatile. East to clean and the pouring spout make it easy to pour the hot water.

Boils a full liter in under 3 minutes. Very clean sophisticated look and it does not take up much space on the counter. So far so great. If anything changes in the wear of the item I will update it here.

I’ve used his kettle for over a month and I am impressed. It heats up extremely quickly and the base is cool enough to sit on the counter. Other than rinsing it out it looks clean as new but I use it every day. I’m very glad I purchased.
For anyone who worries about boiling plastic, this is not the right product you want. The water gauge is a plastic box boiling with the water.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smaller kettle - fast = more coffee for me!
reviews.reviewText: "Nice 1 liter kettle.  Stainless construction, only plastic is window with gradations.  The only reason I didnt give it 5 stars is the lid which doesnt open easily to full 90 degrees, you have to sort of force it back.  Boils full pot of cold water in 4 minutes.  Great deal."

"I bought this for my elderly parents to use instead of having them use a gas stove to boil water. Theyve been using it everyday for a few months so far and its been working perfectly. The water boils within a few minutes."
We like it a lot.  We use it daily for on the go instant coffee.  We hope it passes the test of time unlike the machine we replaced it with.
For the price, I was so pleasantly surprised!.......This kettle functions well and has a nice long chord so the plug reaches the wall outlet easily. It’s lightweight and very portable.

"We are able to use this in a breakroom that doesnt offer a sink or stove. We have made boiling water for soup, tea, cocoa, pour over coffee and just to clean with. Good value! Easy to use and heat very quickly!"

After retiring a high end electric kettle, I bought this one and have been pleasantly surprised. It works wonderfully! It heats water up SO quickly and holds more than I need!, "Definitely a great purchase, plus I havent noticed any changes whatsoever in the 6+ months Ive owned it."

"This is great. Its fast and on the cheaper side for electric kettles. Its also not ugly so thats a plus. Overall Im satisfied, and if youre looking for something that just gets the job done, this is your kettle."
Boils water nicely but the outside of the pot gets very hot in the process and there should be protective features on it. Other than that good quality handle and does the job

"I was expecting the kettle to whistle when ready, but quite the opposite. Its loud and then quiets down when its done. The inside is also difficult for those with large hands to clean without some sort of tool. Beyond that, its excellent and prepares water for my tea in few minutes max so I pretty much have tea on demand."

This is a great tea pot.  I use it daily.  It works great, is easy to use, not too big, and affordable.  When I’m finished with my tea in the morning, I empty any remaining water and leave the lid open to dry out so mold doesn’t build up.

"Bought it a week ago. It might be little early to review but I have been using this a lot and it is serving my purpose better than expected. Perfect kettle for your home or office. Couldnt have asked for better!"
"Pros: Great size (for my use), heats up quick, lid opens wide for easy filling, auto shut-off. Cons: Gets hotter than Id like, no temperature setting."
Works quickly, but watch it as it is quiet. I use it for coffee, tea, anytime I need a cup or a quart of hot water.  So far, good.

In today\s complicated world, it\s nice to have something simple or as Amazon describes the product "Amazon Basics."  Love the tea pot, just press a button and that\s it!  Even has a flip top lid so no removing, no dropping, easy!!  Thanks Amazon!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this! Heats water fast, has auto shut-off
reviews.reviewText: "I use this in my office for a quick instant coffee or cup of tea. Its great! Looks nice, heats up fast, and has auto shut-off in case I have to walk away unexpectedly or forget it."
I was Impressed with how quickly this heats up water. I love the automatic shut off. The only thing I don’t like it how hot the outside gets when it has heated up. Good product for the price though.
This pot is exactly what I needed, tea, oatmeal, hot cocoa,etc, very fast and the pot comes right off of the pad. speaking of pads I also have pads on my Alesis drum set.
Heats super fast and I gave it a four for safety because the outside gets rather hot as well. But it does exactly what I want it to do. Heat my water for tea quickly with no fuss.
It’s not quick like the plastic units from hotel rooms in Europe so I expected more.  Maybe because of 110 power versus 220.  Dunno.
There is plastic inside the kettle which measures the water level. Also, the lid does not come off and stops at 45 degrees, making it hard to clean inside. But it does hold a lot of water.

I am really shocked at how much I like this kettle. I make tea every day, and this just makes it easier. It is very fast, and I find myself just boiling water to sterilize things now, because this makes it so easy.
Got this for the office. Small enough to fit anywhere. Gets water hot very quickly. Love the stainless steel look. Wide enough to be able to put your hand in and clean the insides well enough

Super fast hot water. What else needs to be added? Not commenting on durability as I’ve  been using it only for about 6 months.  But I LOVE IT! Sure beats heating up water on the stove top and quicker than the microwave. Very energy efficient in comparison.
"I make pots of tea for one and I gave away my larger sized kettle which was great after five years, for this one.  Its perfect."

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best products I’ve purchased
reviews.reviewText: I am still amazed at this thing. Mad at myself for not purchasing sooner...I can’t believe how quickly it heats up water. Just amazing, I highly recommend! Not too mention, the quality of this product is astounding to me considering the cost

"I bought it to boil water to kill my weeds and its great for that. Boils quickly, holds a decent amount of water, feels solid. But then I got sick, and now this baby makes tea constantly. Really impressed with this."
Great buy, boil water around 2 minutes.  4.5 star because you will get burn if you accidentally touch the exterior while the water is boiling.  So be careful keep out of reach of children.
Fast! Perfect

reviews.reviewTitle: Great kettle for tea, oatmeal, and more in the office
reviews.reviewText: "I was tired of having to get hot water in my office so I picked up one of these kettles to make tea at my desk. The kettle works great and can heat a liter of cold water to a boil in under 4 minutes. My only complaint is that it is a bit loud when heating water, but it hasnt been an issue for me in my open-plan office."

reviews.reviewTitle: it works great and I like the small size
reviews.reviewText: "Cant beat the low price, it works great and I like the small size. HOWEVER I was going to return it today but missed the return window by a week. I smell and taste an odor which I believe is from the plastic. I have been using this kettle multiple times a day and was hoping the smell/odor would subside. Is it really BPA free?? I decided that I cannot trust this product. Already ordered a replacement."
This is a nice small kitchen kettle. The stainless is attractive enough to keep on your counter and it does not take up much space. The kettle brings water to a boil very quickly

reviews.reviewTitle: Great kettle, especially for the price! A must have
reviews.reviewText: Hard to believe I could be so excited about something so straight forward, but I am! I love the design and ease of use of this electric kettle!!! Really love the automatic shut off too. Super fast way to boil water, weather it’s one cup or 4. And the price just can’t be beat!

"First use was amazing. Boiled cold water from the fridge in less than a minute half-full. Super pleased so far. Definitely only grab the handle when handling. Lobe it so far! I would recommend using only filtered water because it seems it may rust or have buildup easily. Rinse after every use and youre good. 👍"
"Its a great product that heats up the water very quickly and keeps it warm if you needed it to we used to use a coffee pot to make are iced tea and now use this and its so much faster and efficient"

This product meets my expectations to boil water for my hot tea every morning. I like that it is modest in size - it is lighter and easier to lift when filled (1liter capacity) than my former kettle was.  So far I’ve had no problems or complaints with this product.

I love this kettle so much that I gave my larger more expensive model away.  Its super perfect small-ish size for my kitchen.  It boils super fast too.  Love it so much I bought one for my other house.
Bought this to replace a Krup kettle that started leaking.  This is an inexpensive basic good option. Auto shut off (a must for any kettle) and good cord storage.

reviews.reviewTitle: Water has smell of plastic even after 20 uses
reviews.reviewText: "I thought the smell would be gone after a few uses, but its been 3 days, I tried to clean it and boil water with it, the smell persist, not sure if its harmful to human bodies, but definitely not good smell."
"Im a tea drinker and this kettle is fantastic for boiling the water.  It boils the water faster than in the microwave or on the stovetop.  Im very satisfied and would recommend it to anyone."
Works great for the price! Easy to use and we use this A LOT in our household. Nice stainless finish accompanies our other kitchen appliances nicely. Definitely recommend this amazonbasics product.
"Makes hot water REAL FAST. auto shuts off when water is hot so you dont have to be there to turn it off. I made hot water for tea twice yesterday alone!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Great electric kettle for the money
reviews.reviewText: It is pretty basic and does exactly what it says it does. It has a nice auto shut off feature once the water starts to boil.
Not a good product. The bottom of the kettle rusts after a few uses. Not safe to use.
I use this for making tea or heating water for like beverages. It is a great value for the money. I like the automatic shut off and keep warm feature as well as the cordless kettle feature.
This is so helpful when I want some tea or to use a coffee press. I liked it so much I bought it for my good friend and she loves it too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works efficiently and easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the two of us.  Smaller than I expected but glad it is.  Heats quickly, stays hot for a while and much easier to clean than my old one.

"Nearly perfect for what I needed. I have been using this at least once a day for months now, and its doing fine. Heats water quickly and painlessly for my morning coffee, although the spring on the lid is getting a bit weak already. Mine accumulated serious lime deposits in short order thanks to the local water, but some CLR took care of that without any drama."

reviews.reviewTitle: I use this product almost daily. Time saver!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Fill it up, plug it in, press the button. Boiling water in minutes. I use it for tea and to blanch small amounts of vegetables.
"Nothing crazy.  It works well and its small.  The water boiling gets a bit loud, not sure if thats normal, but otherwise I love it.  Cheap, small, and easy.  And feels well made."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great hot pot at a decent price!
reviews.reviewText: I love this hot pot; never had one before.  I now use EVERY DAY as it gets the water HOTTER in less time than the microwave!  What a deal!  I drink a lot of tea.
Small but OK for a bedside table or your comfy corner when you want to snuggle with a warm throw and a good book.  Makes it great to not have to go to the kitchen n for hot tea.
I am inordinately fond of this kettle. Heats the water So Fast. What is up with that? Can this company make other things, please? Think of the world problems we could solve.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and works great
reviews.reviewText: My husband uses this for everything and it heats up fast for oatmeal, tea and cup a soup.  Stays hot and auto shut off!  Perfect for work or home.
I keep this on the corner of my desk to make tea or warm water for French pressed coffee. Its size is convenient and design pretty simple and effective. Hopefully it holds up well!
This is a great product! Has an extremely short cord for safety so be aware you’ll need a surge protector cord most likely unless you have a receptacle in your countertop.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice looking and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: "I got this to use at my desk at work at its perfect.  Its very nice looking and easy to use. Its a little loud when it first starts up but gets quieter as it works.  Ive used other kettles and that seems to be a common thing."
Works very well but I’m still learning how long to let it go for hot water not scalding water  It’s on the smaller side which is perfect for me.
This thing is awesome! Perfect size for a couple cups of tea etc. Boils quickly, shuts off automatically, and cleaning is a breeze when descaling with white vinegar.
"Very annoying.  The top doesnt go all the way down."
My wife and I love this kettle. Boils water in under 1 minute and has auto shut off.. Perfect for our needs
There is a tube in the inside that prevents you from being able to clean the inside easily. This is a problem because of the scale buildup that seems to happen a lot.
We use this kettle daily and it is fast, efficient and space saving on our cluttered counter. Simple to operate and it looks good too. This was an excellent buy!

"This little unit works really well. It is smaller than many of the others, but thats what I like about it. Most others are larger and I only need a few cups at a time anyway. So far so good! Nice little hot water maker."

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast and easy, not too durable
reviews.reviewText: "Works well and is fast. However, ours is rusting a little at the bottom of the reservoir. But, I do use it at least once a day and we have hard water, so Im still pretty happy with it. It is a bit loud."
Got this so I could make tea in my room and not disturb my roommates, absolutely fantastic and now use it to make oatmeal before work as well (I usually open and am up before dawn).
I really like how fast this warms up doesn’t seem to have a timer it just keeps going until you stop it yourself and no temperature setting.. but it’s quick

reviews.reviewTitle: I loved my new tea kettle until the lid quit working ...
reviews.reviewText: "I loved my new tea kettle until the lid quit working (the release wasnt functioning).  I was disappointed, but I contacted Amazon and they had me print a return label and send it back.  They immediately sent a replacement.  Whole exchange took less than 2 weeks.  I am more careful with the lid than I was previously and expect it will last a very long time.", I love, love, love my tea kettle.  It is really fast, though noisy.  I like the noise, because I know that once it stops it will be done heating by the time I can walk into the kitchen.

This little kettle is the perfect size for a small household. Small footprint, looks great, durable and gets water fast. I use it all the time and I love it. After the water boils it shuts off for itself. This safety feature is a great plus. One girlfriend admired it so much, she bought one for herself!

I love it.  I\m still looking for something smaller (1 cup) to take when I travel.  The little "curlicue" thing that Amazon sells quits working about after 1 use.  Otherwise than being too big for what I want it works really well and looks nice.

I love that it works.  As far as cleaning, since the lid doesn’t remove, it is a little difficult for me to clean it as I like, but with only water going in it, I try to use only distilled water and rinse it out and let air dry immediately after use and is cooled down

Purchased other electric kettles in the past on Amazon and elsewhere. All of them lasted under a year or less. The base would burn out or start smoking in a few months., This one is smaller but all we need., So far it works fine , it’s quick and the size is perfect. This one has a filter at the spout., 4 stars now and 5 stars if it continues to last .
Perfect size for a small kitchen. Heats water quickly and shuts off automatically. My daughter needed multiple cups of tea a day and this was perfect!

reviews.reviewTitle: "If youre not careful you might get burned."
reviews.reviewText: "It does what its meant to do but my concern is safety.  It gets extremely hot in the outside and its base has no attachment to the kettle. Any mistake it would burn you to pieces.  I am returning this item."

I use it to make hot water for my tea.  It takes a very short time for it to boil. I think around a minute or two which makes it really convenient and safe.  Boiling water in the stove can be dangerous especially when you are multi tasking and doing several chores at the same time.  Great product.
Finally I made my parents update from their old kettle! My parents absolutely love it. It’s easy to use, boils water fast and my parents can have their pan con cafe in a snap!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great electric pot.
reviews.reviewText: This pot is used between eight and ten times a day.  It’s fast and the water stays hot for a good while.  It meets my expectations and unlike other pots I’ve had does not leak!

This is smaller than I expected (as compared to the one I had before, which I was replacing with this one), but I have had zero issues thus far. Shuts off when it is supposed to, even if you go slightly over the max line (not a lot), and boils quickly. I am happy with this: cute and functional!

reviews.reviewTitle: Where has this been all my life?!
reviews.reviewText: "Probably one of the better purchases Ive made this year. And its so much nicer looking in real life - does not look as cute and compact as it really is on Amazon. Best of all, its stainless steel (not plastic), heats water quickly and using it is a no brainer. Thank you Amazon for this awesome product."

"Ramen? Tea? A relaxing hot water foot bath? You got it in less than five minutes! Im from Denver where water takes forever to boil. This product works super well and expediates many of my cooking routines. I love it and would definately purchase again!"

Super easy to use and super fast! No whistling when ready (no waking up sensitive pets and children). I even use it to heat water to make oatmeal on a busy morning. Six months later, this is exactly what I needed and everything I wanted it to be.
This little device is awesome, it can take cold water and bring it to a boil in about 3 minutes, easy clean and detachable base make picking the pitch up effortless. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM!!!!!
Use this pot for tea. Works great. Heats up fast. You can put more or less water in it. Shuts off automatically. Well made and looks good.
"Love it! Boils water super fast and small enough to keep in a desk drawer at work for hot tea and oatmeal so I dont have to use the discussing microwave at work just to heat water."
The kettle heats quickly and holds enough water for several cups of tea. Nice clean design that looks good on my kitchen counter.

reviews.reviewTitle: Metal might not have been the best idea
reviews.reviewText: "I had a plastic one like this that I broke so I got this one. Since its made of metal. . . it gets REALLY HOT on the outside. I wasnt ready for that but now that I know, I can be more mindful."

reviews.reviewTitle: Rust on the top after 3 months
reviews.reviewText: This kettle rusted pretty quickly, on the top as you can see in the attached picture. I strongly recommend against using this kettle.
"Got this for my job.  I like that it has auto-shut off. But like a stove-top kettle, it is loud; doesnt whistle but you can hear it. It is very fast."

This will stay hot for like an hour which is why I like it!! I can make my matcha then about half an hour later I can use it for lemon water and it’s still warm from earlier! It also heats up very quickly!
This little guy has served me well for many months now. So, I can recommend it without reservations.

I was tired of nuking my water to make tea or hot water to thaw breast milk.  I had a metal classic stove top kettle which takes forever and with a new born I don’t want it to whistle.  Decided to give this a try and Korimomdo previous my kettle., It has been fabulous.  Sleek and easy to use.  More people in the family are drinking tea now.  It’s a cinch to thaw breast milk now.  It’s very fast to get water to a boil and no after taste in my tea. So for it’s been great.

reviews.reviewTitle: A must have! No more jumping out of the shower to grab the kettle.
reviews.reviewText: Boils water in just a few minutes. Great for making tea and cup of noodles. Compact and easy to use. It can seem loud at first but the noise just seems normal now. Can’t beat it for the price. 2 of my co-workers have purchased this product after me letting letting them use it at the workplace. I definitely recommend it !!!

I love this kettle!, It’s easy to use, easy to clean, and it works very well. It might be a little small if you have several people in the house who use it, but it works great for just myself! I use it for hot chocolate, tea, making a hot water bottle, and sometimes even oatmeal if I’m in a rush that day.

First time I’ve ever owned one of these electric teapots. It heats very quickly. Just the right size for me & my bf. It’s still free of mineral deposits & I’ve had it for a few months. It helps to leave it empty when it’s sitting around. Love it!
One month later and no problems. Gets nice and hot, does its job and turns itself off. I love it., Build quality is also nice.

I love the speed that this small unit boils water. Fits nicely in my hand to pour., Attractive simple design and best price after looking locally in the stores. I bought an open box one for a fraction of the other retail options, and I was not disappointed.
Works well enough for boiling water for two persons. A bit of a problem if you have a guest.

"We bought this to replace our keurig, and it has been wonderful! It heats the water up quickly and easily. My only complaint is the lid could open a bit more, but I am very happy with it. Its even easy enough for my kids to use. :)"
Returned as the inside was not all stainless—the water gauge is plastic and visible in the inside—I worried with the temperature of the boil it’d melt or corrode over time.

"I bought this for my kitchen at work. I use it a few times a week, usually filling it up only a quarter of the way, and have had no problems. Boils water very fast. Isnt too loud. Shuts off as soon as the water is ready. Would recommend."

"This kettle works great for boiling water for my French press. Ive been using it for about a year and its never given me problems. Its super low maintenance and it doesnt take up too much space. On a note, I only boil water in this so I dont know how different liquids will affect it."
It boils water quickly for tea or instant coffee.  It does everything I expected it to do.

reviews.reviewTitle: "One of the best things Ive ever bought!"
reviews.reviewText: "I am crazy about this little pot! Im an avid tea drinker and love having boiling water in 1 minute or so. It is well designed and very safe to use. I cant believe I wasted so many years of heating my water in the microwave and it never being hot enough and taking forever! So I cant say enough about this great pot! This is one of the best things Ive ever bought!"

Needs a cord at least long enough to plug into the wall. There is no way to use this without an extension cord. Seems like an extension cord is more of a safety hazard than having at least a two foot cord. Cord is only six inches long
Solid product. Made tea for a class of 35 for three weeks and will do it again for the next class.  Heats fast and easy to use
"Love this sturdy little water heater. I use it at least every day and after 2 months its working great."

"I use the kettle to boil water for my stainless steel water bottle. After 2 months of using the kettle, the water started to taste metallic. I wasnt sure where the metallic taste was coming from - the tap, the kettle, or the water bottle.  Then, at month 3, I saw rust at the bottom of the Amazon kettle and threw that out very quickly."
I had one before and I put it in the trailer and ordered a new one. This new one is sweet and I just love it and it heats the water faster.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product but note smaller (1-Liter) size
reviews.reviewText: Great product. My only gripe is I didn’t read the fine print!  This is only a 1-liter pot, which is smaller than standard. We’ll use it, but wish it was bigger.
Great water heater, boils very quickly and not terribly loud. I use it in the office and it doesnt seem to anger anyone, especially since it boils so quickly (the loudness doesnt last long.)

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for my daily French press coffee.
reviews.reviewText: This kettle is exactly what I needed. The form factor is not too big. It looks great on the counter. The water comes to a boil quicker than the more expensive kettle it replaced.  We will see about durability. So far so good.
This was a gift for a coworker and she loves it. The only complaint I have heard id the fill line being slightly deceptive. She said she just pays close attention. I would recommend for the office!

Very fast little kettle! It works a bit better than some more expensive kettles from, e.g., Hamilton Beach. I like the material., "I have used it for one month at this point, so I cant speak to the kettles durability."

I am very impressed with this product. It warms hot water in less than 5 minutes, is easy to clean and maintain and was well worth the money. When the water was pipping hot, it shut itself off and stayed very warm. I truly appreciated this feature....No Fire Hazard Here! I purchased this for a group I belong to and loved it so much, I am purchasing another one for my office. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: AmazonBasics Stainless Steel Electric Kettle - Works Great!
reviews.reviewText: "AmazonBasics Stainless Steel Electric Kettle - Works Great! Its not often you pay a modest sum for something that works great, but this little kettle does the trick.  Excellent."
You put in cold water and get hot water. Really unique., Seriously, it has a small footprint in space and does the job quickly and silently., A+

"Id been waffling on whether or not I needed an electric kettle in addition to my\xa0", Breville BMF600XL Milk Cafe Milk Frother, "\xa0(which warms water also), but Im glad I finally did it. Ive used this electric kettle daily for tea or hot chocolate for about a month now. Its very quick - only about a minute to heat up - and definitely gets HOT. It isnt quiet, but I actually appreciate this; you can distinguish by the sound how close the water is to boiling, so you can turn off the unit if you want water that wont scald.", "In terms of design - it looks sharp on my countertop, but is also fairly discrete; its small so it doesnt take up much space. Keep in mind that the electrical cord is only about 3 long. It does have the cord wrap under the unit to hide excess cord, which I appreciate. And the on/off switch is very easy to see and use. You flip it up like a light switch to turn on and it turns orange to indicate it is running. When the water has reached boiling, the switch flips down and the light turns off. The light is important since you may not hear the switch when the water is boiling.", "The only downside is that water spots do form on the interior since there is no good way to tip this upside down to dry. Im interested to see if this will cause damage over time, but the issue isnt big enough to knock a star considering the price. Overall, extremely pleased!"

This boils hot water extremely fast and great for use for any hot drink or coffee press.  If you fill to high it will spit water out.  Have had three weeks so not sure about longevity of use and if it keeps up

I got rid of my hot/cold water cooler at the office - and am VERY pleased with this little electric kettle for simply & quickly making hot water for tea.  I liked it so much that I got 2 more for our home and travel trailer!

This is my first electric kettle purchase. I can’t believe I waited this long! It’s fast, convenient with the lift-off base and cord keeper, and small enough to not take up too much precious counter space. Well done, Amazon!
I love electric kettles and they just need to work.  This one heats up in no time, looks great and is easy to clean.
"This kettle is quick and quiet.  It doesnt take up much space on my counter and it is smaller than the previous kettle (different brand) I owned for 1 day that had to be returned due to leaking."

reviews.reviewTitle: "I got this when my tea drinking company came for ..."
reviews.reviewText: "I got this when my tea drinking company came for the weekend. Now I use it for tons of things. I think its one of those products which after purchasing one thinks why didnt I get this years ago!."
The water heats fast and gets really hot.  I only wish there was a warming function to keep it warm for a little while after the water heats and it turns off.

"Got this for my wife to make tea at work. Two weeks later, its still on the counter in our kitchen. She loves it so much, using it every day, that she wants it to stay home. Oh well, Ill just have to order another for work...."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Tea Kettle For The Price
reviews.reviewText: "This tea kettle is exactly what I was looking for. Its well built, doesnt take up a lot of space and boils water really really quickly."
I’ve had this for one month and the inside edges are getting rusty. Too bad, because it’s the perfect small size and works really well otherwise.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worth the Purchase if You Love Tea
reviews.reviewText: Simply kettle that heats water quickly and I use it for everything. Very durable and well worth the price. I love it and plan to get another one for my classroom!

"I was dubious at first with the low price.  But its a great buy!  Love it, its just enough for what we need and of course being smaller boils quicker.  It isnt as noisy as some others when on and not as heavy."
Great kettle, works perfectly, looks good and boils fast.  I was concerned about buying the "basic" kettle but it is great and I would buy it again (although I hope it lasts a while first).
I liked it, it is small but contains a lot of water. And it keeps it hot for a long period of time, no need to reboil it after the first use.

reviews.reviewTitle: This works well. I do wish I could see ...
reviews.reviewText: This works well. I do wish I could see more of the water boiling, and it is definitely smaller than our last one, but I knew what I was getting. THe biggest factor is longevity, and that remains to be seen.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Not very fast, but it gets the job done."
reviews.reviewText: It takes a while for the water to start boiling, but it works fine for what it is.
"This Kettle is just as good as my more expensive stainless steel kettles. It heats up quickly to a boil. However I dont use it very much so I cant comment on its longevity."

"I purchased this kettle in August of 2018 and in about a year it developed discoloration or rust of some kind in several spots. I dont know what the problem is exactly but I dont trust it around something Im drinking. This may be an okay product for short term use, but if you want to keep it in your kitchen invest in something more durable."
"This hot water kettle really boil the water fast. We always packed it to family travel. Only think I dont like is this kettle is not insulated, ppl will got burn inf touch the outside by accident."
It works! Not much more to say....hasn’t let me down
