Overall I am happy with the purchase and will update this post if anything happens that I feel changes this review."

"I wasnt sure I would like this electric kettle but I am now hooked. I use it to make hot water for hot chocolate every morning and the wife uses it for a cup of tea. It will be perfect for use in our travel trailer, wont have to light the stove and wait on the tea kettle, just fill the electric kettle, press down the lever and by the time I get my cup of coco & marshmellows ready I have HOT water."

PROS: Works as intended and is cheap., CONS: Contains plastic parts that touch boiling water, Had no issues with rust or functionality of the kettle. Heats up quickly and serves its intended purpose of boiling water. But the fact that there were plastic parts that have contact with boiling water is a unnerving. Look elsewhere for other electric kettles that contain no plastic parts that are subjected to water.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek looking, convenient, quick, excellent value for money
reviews.reviewText: "After owning a 2L plastic kettle with internal heating coils for many years, I decided to upgrade. While this kettle is smaller is is also more practical. It looks very sleek. The fact that its removable from its heating element makes it much more convenient. Water heating time is about the same. I think Ill be able to get away wiwitwiwith descaling it less than the other type over time."

reviews.reviewTitle: Near perfect for an afternoon cup of tea!
reviews.reviewText: Boils 1l of water in just under 4 minutes, stays pretty warm for more than an hour.  The only thing that would make this kettle better is having one more notch in the hot pad for the cord.  It seems no matter where I plug it in, I have a little too much or not quite enough cord (coming out of the current notch).

purchased this for the office, and everyone loves having the option now to have tea instead of the routine coffee from the coffee maker. This little pot works very well and is easy to keep clean. I like being able to see the water level from the side. I would recommend this product to a friend and I would purchase it again if I needed to.

reviews.reviewTitle: An essential purchase for hot beverage enthusiasts!
reviews.reviewText: "I drink a lot of hot beverages, so a stove kettle just doesnt cut it. This saves so much time! My daily go to is a thermos, a tea bag or two, and this kettle.", I\ve had this for a couple months now and encountered no issues. I generally ad a "watch out for..." kind of tip in my reviews, but this one is so far a workhorse. I highly recommend it.

"I love this kettle! I use it in conjunction with my French press for coffee and it works great! Water boils in under 5 minutes, and it is super easy to clean. My only complaint is that I wish it beeped or made some type of noise when it shuts off and the water is ready. Its not a big problem for me, because I have gotten into the habit of setting my kitchen timer before walking away. Other than that, no complaints!"

I am really enjoying this electric kettle. Although it does not save time as advertised (the water heats up in the same amount of time as on the stove), it is more convenient for me. I can turn it on and walk away! It shuts off automatically when it starts to boil. No need to worry about checking the stove. Also, what I really like is that the water stays very hot in this thing for a long time.

"Works great and gets the water super hot very quickly. Just know that the pot gets VERY hot to the touch once the water has been heated. I assumed it would be like my Yetti travel mug with two liners so the outer liner doesnt get hot, but nope. This tea kettle will burn you. Keep away from little hands and clumsy fingers."

reviews.reviewTitle: Boil a liter of water in about 3 mins.
reviews.reviewText: Too much coffee upsets my tummy so I switched to tea which this can boil 1 liter of water in about 3 minutes. No joke. 3 mins. well constructed of stainless steel it is cleaned with a little vinegar and water. filter is easily removable for cleaning and has a 1 year warranty. This has saved me alot of time and energy and now i wanna buy one for my aunt., "Cons- only boils water and doesnt have a warmer. once water is boiling it shuts off."
This item was smaller than I was expecting, but that’s my own fault for not reading what I was getting. This works very quickly and efficiently. It definitely gets very warm on the outside.

"I love my kettle!!! I use it every day!! The only thing I didnt like about it was that if you leave water in the kettle, youll have water spots at the bottom. It isnt even close to a deal breaker for me. All I would need to do is clean it. It makes really hot water in less than a minute. The manual suggests not get the bottom of the kettle wet. Thats the part that connects to the base. And make sure to only use it for water."

"When i bought it, i did see someone showed the pic of how bad the quality is, i was a little worry about it too. But i trust Amazon, so i gave a try. So far so good, i havent got problem yet. The plastic part will be boiled when you try to get the hot water, but i think the material is made safely for heating. otherwise, how can they get product permission to sell it in the market."

reviews.reviewTitle: It heats up water in no time and the size is perfect. I have it pictured next to a standard ...
reviews.reviewText: I use this every day for my tea in the evenings. It heats up water in no time and the size is perfect. I have it pictured next to a standard sized coffee pot for size reference.

I’ve only used this electric kettle for last two day several times a day. So far it works well my Only complaint is that the water temperature is to dang hot! I’ve burned, My tongue twice. Coffee mug is even to hot to put your hands around. I’ve had to wait a while after making tea to even drink it. I’m not sure if this water temperature is normal temp for electric kettle since this is my first purchase of one.

Pros:, -small footprint/hight make it better for my small kitchen, -High spout makes for an easy pour accuracy (I make coffee with my aeropress), -Stainless steel looks nice, Cons:, -Does not boil 2 cups as fast as my older cheap plastic kettle. Probably 30secs-1min slower., -Stainless steel can get smudgy.

"After a few weeks of using this a couple times a day, it has worked adequately. Unfortunately I did not read the reviews on this and every one of them about the base rusting is absolutely true. Ive started to see little spots of corrosion on the bottom. However I believe these are harmless and will keep using it until it gets more severe. You just have to be adamant about not leaving water in it when not using it and keeping the lip open so it can dry out.", For the price I would say it is average.

"Cant comment on durability since Ive had it only 6 days, but no issues yet.  By the time Ive ground the beans and set up my AeroPress, the .5L of water is at my brewing temperature of 170F.  Saves a lot of counter space since I no longer have to use my induction hot plate in my dens small bathroom."

I needed a new electric kettle after mine gave up after ten years so ordered this because of the high ratings and "Amazon Choice".  There is no lid to open to add the water so you have to try and fill it through the spout. I tried this and the spout is so small that most of the water ran down the side of the kettle itself.  Returned.

"I dont know how I ever survived winter without this little kettle! I love that its small, so it fits in the filtered water dispenser of my fridge. Its fast, its cute, and easy to clean. Were drinking pour-over coffee, hot chocolate and tea all the time now thanks to this kettle!"

"Things I like:  Nice size, design and functionality and, of course, price.  Does not taste like plastic.  Thing not so much:  Left-handed people are not accommodated.  My R.I.P. Proctor-Silex had measuring graphs on both sides of the kettle which I did not notice until today when I used my new Amazon pot.  Otherwise, Im happy with the purchase and I supposed Ill get used to using my right hand, as I have with so many other things I deal with day-to-day."

Purchased this for my desk at work as I like a nice cup of tea several times throughout the day! Pot heats water very fast and outside cools quickly so no fear of being burned by accidentally touching. Holds enough for several cups of tea. Definitely would recommend this if needing something with a good size capacity, quick heating and overal convenience during your day!

I was skeptical about getting an electric kettle...my poor old stainless stove top kettle was getting rusty too often.  I only use it now when I need more than 1 quart or so of hot water.  The kettle heats very quickly - about the same time it takes my bagel to toast!!!  So far it has been a very good purchase....great price, looks good on the counter...so important!!!  Thanks!!

Wanted so much to like this snd its seems to have gotten many positive reviews. But for me, I must have gotten a defective one because after using it only about 4 times it began to rust on the inside.  See my pictures. Gonna try and get a replacement and maybe raise the number of stars., "UPDATE:  Upgraded to 4 stars after replacement pot was sent.  Great customer service.  Ive been using the replacement regularly for a couple of weeks now and there doesnt seem to be any sign of the rust."

It does what it is supposed to do, heat water.  A couple minor things: it heats the water too hot for my liking but I guess that is better than not being hot enough.  It also is very loud as it warms up, I was surprised at how loud it was.  I use this 1 to 2 times per weekday and so far after 2 months it has held up well.

"Our stove kettle met the floor one day and died (lol), so I choose this one because we just use it to boil small amounts of water and thats it, no need to special heating, warming, timer and all that crap, just a simple and done.", Really hoping for this one to last a while.

"This electric kettle is small and does a good job of boiling water. The lid does not open a full 90 degrees, so its a little hard to fill and reach inside The interior is pretty smooth, except at the little plastic window. The metal body is not heat insulated, so be careful not to touch it while its hot."

reviews.reviewTitle: Good kettle but one fatal flaw
reviews.reviewText: The good: Fast working kettle that works like it should. The lid open wide enough to fill from a faucet however not as easy with a tap filter like Pur., The bad: opening is smaller so if you have larger hands this will be a pain to properly clean. Also if you open the lid too soon after boiling water the hot condensation will drip down and onto the handle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works super fast and makes very hot water
reviews.reviewText: "Ive had this for a month. Works super fast and makes very hot water. They only complaint is that the lid to fill the pot does not open past 45 degrees so you have to tip it to fill it up. I am glad to find a metal one, the plastic ones seem to make plastic-y smelling water."

I was looking for a stylish tea pot that wouldn\t break the bank. This one does the trick! It works perfectly to boil water for my drinks and it looks great. Paid much less than I would have for a "name brand" that does the exact same  thing. This was a no-brainer for me. Thanks, Amazon Basics!

It could be a little larger in capacity.  It makes hot, boiling water very quickly, but only hold enough water for about 2 cups .  Then you must refill it, and heat it again, but it does work quickly.  I use it most mornings to make a cup of instant coffee, or tea.  It works great for this.  I would buy it again.

The product is as described, works well, heats up fast. Looks sleek and expensive. It is a great purchase for the price., The only thing one needs to be weary of is the fact that if you have never used a stainless steel water kettle before is to never touch the body of the kettle. Keep out of reach of babies and toddlers.

I love that you can see the water level.  I don’t like the spout because it doesn’t come with a cover like a kettle does. I think that’s important as we all know there are particles floating in the air all the time that we can’t see which can get into the water thru the spout. Just please add a cover for the spout and I think it would be perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with operation of kettle!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to be able, To still have my green tea while having a kitchen remodel, Great little electric kettle, boils much quicker than my tea kettle on the gas stove!  Very happy with this purchase, considering continuing  to use this even when stove is hooked back up

reviews.reviewTitle: Just the right size, and works well, but with plastic
reviews.reviewText: "Im happy with this, except for one minor caveat.  I had wanted to avoid hot water from a plastic container, and so got this metal pot.  Unfortunately, the water level window is made of plastic, and so I ended up still exposing the hot water to plastic.  Next time, Ill get a glass kettle instead."

I was looking for a kettle no electrical for a long time, i look every where but non was electric and in the $30.00 price, until i found this one!!! Im so impresse i need it most for my babys water i have to boiled so it so perfect compact, it boild the water fast and no need a big space. I recommend the product 200 percent!!!

"This kettle boils faster than my traditional kettle on my gas stove and faster than any other kettle Ive used. My electric bill has not had a noticeable impact since buying this. I wouldnt put anything besides water as there is a stem directly below the flip lid and it would be difficult to clean stock off of it."

It heats water quickly and does what it says. The reason for 4stars is that is has a plastic window and I would have liked it to be all stainless., It’s very basic but a good value. I have a nice one for everyday that I can control temperature. I purchased this for travel and it’s great for that purpose.

Love this little fast heating kettle!  It is smaller than my old one, but much lighter, which is good for someone with arthritis, like me.  I love the lighted control switch which lets me know when the contents are hot and having the clear view of amounts in plainsite makes it so much easier to fill.  This great little pot is certainly a bargain for $20.00!

"Bought this for the break room at my workplace because my coworkers and I like to make tea and cocoa. We love to use it! Its so easy to operate and heats up the water quickly. Plus, it pours like a dream. One of my co-workers liked it so much they bought one for their own home. Definitely recommend."

reviews.reviewTitle: so that water gets super hot so one tip is to turn off after ...
reviews.reviewText: "This is one product i had been putting off from buying for a very long time and then once you buy it, you regret for not having bough it early.  it does its job and keeps the water hot.  There is no temperature setting, so that water gets super hot so one tip is to turn off after you hear the water boil twice or thrice.  Very cost efficient and no frills or nothing fancy, which I like"

"I purchased this for my 89 year old mother. She opened it and figured it out all on her own. She said that its easy to use, and it heats up the water quickly. The size is great for her, since its not too big or heavy...just the right size for water for her instant oatmeal and coffee."

"I use this Electric Kettle every day to make French Press Coffee.  It only gets filtered water, so I dont wash it out.  The water is hot, hot, hot when it comes out which is perfect for hot coffee!  Nice size and sits on my counter full time.  I dont feel that it is bulky or in the way."

This was a great purchase. The lid pops up nicely when you press the latch on the handle and it pours nicely without any side spillage. There is a centrally placed plastic disc in the middle of the lid so you can push the lid closed without burning your finger when the lid is hot.  A well designed kettle at a great price.

At my job I have to be outside a lot but still have access to AV. Having hot water is such a huge help. I highly recommend. Only issue I have is it’s easy for mold to start growing in the bottom and tricky to reach your hand in with a sponge to clean. But maybe that’s just me cuz I have large hands

Love this !!Water heats so fast and stays warm for a long time.My electric stove takes forever to boil my tea kettle and then the stove top takes forever to cool down.Waste of electricity!!This should come in handy if your power goes out..if you have one of those jump start compressors.This also is good looking.Very happy with purchase.!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, functional, just what I needed for the office
reviews.reviewText: Setting up a new office, I needed a way to make proper black tea from water at a full boil without taking too much desk space. This fits nicely on the same small tray with my tea pot and cups, and the one-liter capacity matches nicely with the tea pot I chose. It does the job and seems likely to last.

"It fits perfectly on our counter top and doesnt take up much room.  It heats up water so quickly, it just doesnt hold a lot of water.  Works fine for our small family.  We only make a cup or two a day.  I would like to purchase one for work as well."

I drink yerba mate daily. I had a hario kettle (higher end kettle for 3rd wave coffee purposes). Well, I no longer need the precision of the hario kettle for coffee as I am a yerba mate drinker now. This little electric kettle is fast to heat, easy to use, turns off on its own, and easy to clean. Perfect for my tea purposes.

reviews.reviewTitle: whole pot gets hot from outside. Plastic inside may melt. its small in size.
reviews.reviewText: whole pot gets hot from outside. Plastic inside may melt. its small in size.
Great pot, heats up quickly and very easy to clean. If scald builds up a quick clean with vinegar water is all you need. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Was pleasantly surprised by how nice this Kettle was.
reviews.reviewText: Was pleasantly surprised by how nice this Kettle was. I was afraid it would be too small, my older one that died was twice the size. But it is actually perfect for the single user. Holds about 2- 2 1/2 cups of very hot water. Perfect for when I want a cup of tea., "Also has a nice look to it, very stylish, and the power button is in a place where it doesnt catch on things. Equally as good as the $50 kettle it replaces."

I’ve used this for a week or so and it’s just what I needed. Simple to use and works just like it’s supposed to. I got this one because it is a smaller kettle than most that I’ve seen, and it’s lightweight. I added a size comparison picture next to my Nutribullet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Foul taste and smell in second week
reviews.reviewText: "We started out being really happy with the unit: super fast boiling water for coffee and tea.  By its second week I noticed a funny after taste in my tea.  My wife then noticed it in her drinks too.  Since we use bottle water, the after taste cant be from the water we use.  After rotating between different teas and coffees to identify the cause, we had no other culprits but the pot.  Return was easy with Amazon purchases, but we didnt buy it for the return."

"I purchased this little kettle for my son who is living in barracks on a military base. He loves it and uses it everyday for his tea and ramen noodles; basically anything that requires boiling water. He says that its a little loud, but heats the water up super fast. Hes had the kettle for a little over 2 months and its still working perfectly.  Would definitely purchase again"

This thing is amazing. I had originally bought it as a gift. It worked so well that A couple months down the line we bought another one for our own home. We use it daily. Matches our other stainless steel appliances in our kitchen and it works flawlessly.

"Nothing like reaching over the pot & having the lid pop open & release scalding steam on your hand or arm. The cover doesnt open wide either, so guys w/ fat hands & big arms cant get in there easily w/ a sponge. Id opt for better quality if I were you."
Got this in December 18 and now it has rust on the bottom of the kettle. I dry it out after use but it is still rusting.

I was always wanting to purchase a french press coffee maker and after doing my homework I found one here on Amazon.com.  I then realized I needed a quick and easy way to boil the water and after a little more investigating here on Amazon.com,  I located this item. It works great and looks great also. You can display it with your other kitchen appliances.

"Good product. Make sure that you adhere to the max/min water guidelines. It helps with the products auto-off feature, which is why I had to buy a new one when my other-brand unit stopped turning itself off, creating a hazard issue if I ever forgot that I was boiling water... which I sometimes do."

reviews.reviewTitle: it’s such a nice classy looking kettle
reviews.reviewText: Just got the kettle.  Was quite the hassle getting it delivered.....the delivery/customs broker didn’t get it to me for over 4 days in trying.  In any case, it’s such a nice classy looking kettle.  Stainless steel.  Sure, it’s just a kettle, but it looks good and works great.  Water boils quickly too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good value for money. Ideal size.
reviews.reviewText: "Perfect size kettle for 4 standard cups of tea, which makes it big enough for a family to enjoy tea or coffee together, and small enough to take little counter space. Good deal for its price. The top doesnt pop open all the way, so cleaning is not 100% convenient, but its doable. Heats fast. No odors."

reviews.reviewTitle: good fit for compact water need, healthy, convenient design
reviews.reviewText: I get this kettle for placing to my loft, I feel take a cup of water upstairs is kind of trouble. so this dedicated kettle upstairs will be perfect for afternoon tea and morning tea. I get the 1 L one, smaller than a normal full capacity kettle, but good for my need, and do not take too much space. quite, fast heating. like the design of poop up cap, can finish all the task using one hand. full star!

The last one I had was from a drug store. Had a coil going through it, impossible to clean beyond filling it with soapy water and shaking it. This one I washed as soon as I got it. My hand fit inside fine and seemed just like cleaning a normal piece of cookery. Works just fine, boils faster than a microwave.
Easy to use and gets the job done fast. However leaves a minor rust spot at the bottom after few days which is expected.

"I love this little kettle. It works quickly (usually while I shower) and I dont have the annoyance of the screaming teakettle.  I also like the safety feature that it shuts off when the water is hot. Perfect for heating water to make tea or use in a frendch press for coffee."
Love this kettle.  Sleek design, simple and did its job super well.  There is no heating element inside the water storage part of the pot, so it is not hard to clean at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Happy that its shorter than some others anc thats a big plus!!!!"
reviews.reviewText: "Not very sturdy looking, but works very well and I really like it.  I figure if it lasts a year, I will surely have gotten my moneys worth, but Id bet it will last longer than that.  Was really shocked at how perfect it is, for the price.  Dont over fill or you will get burned, as the directions tell you. Not as tall as some others, so fits under my cabinets better.  Love the size and shape."

I bought this for my Mom to heat water to make iced tea!  She was forever boiling water on the stove with the tea bags inside and forgetting it only to have the pot boil over!  This has been the perfect solution to making tea for her and she loves it!

"This hot pot is perfect! It heats up water super fast, turns itself off when its done, and sits on a base so that the pot can be lifted off to deliver the hot water where needed. Im super impressed by this product that functions as it should, looks nice, and carries a reasonable price tag."

We use an electric kettle often for coffee and tea. Our previous brand leaked annoyingly at its lip when pouring. I got this nicely priced kettle and there is never a drop leaked. Keep in mind it is only one liter, but the volume is plenty for us and it takes up less room than our old one

"I want to like this kettle. It come to a boil quickly. But once the water is boiling it shuts off and doesnt continue to keep the water warm very long. Cleaning is difficult since you cant fit a hand in the kettle to clean it."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great when you don’t have/want a coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I don’t want a coffee maker in my classroom because I’m worried I won’t clean it up properly. But I want coffee in my classroom. This is perfect for me because I can heat up water quickly, add some instant coffee and sweetener, and enjoy a simple caffeinated beverage with minimal cleanup!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with this pot, perfect size for one or two people
reviews.reviewText: "Really like this electric water pot, it heats up quickly and is just the perfect size for me.  Ive used it for about a month now, 2-3 times a day, every day with not a single issue.", I would honestly pay double for the price I paid for this pot, good quality, performance and reliability so far.

"This little kettle is amazing. It holds a good amount of water and heats up super fast. Within 5 minutes the water is boiling. Plus the water stays hot for quite a while in the kettle if you need more later. My only con would be that it doesnt make a ding or noise when its ready. But I can definitely look past that since it boils so quickly."

"We used this kettle while on vacation. Once home, we decided to purchase a kettle. I was hesitant about ordering this one since some of the reviews werent great. Then, I remembered I HAD USED IT for a week! LOL! Its just right. Small enough to sit on the counter, works quickly, and priced right. My entire family is very satisfied with the purchase, and Im glad I didnt spend more for another brand."

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect travel kettle for the right price
reviews.reviewText: We took several road trips over the summer and needed a kettle for our infant as we don’t like to use hotel kettles. This Amazon kettle has the right price and size. You can use its augmented reality feature to see its size relative to other appliances. We use this kettle all the time and highly recommend this product.

"Simply put, this little guy works miracles at 212℉. Little dude lives in my break room at work and provides me with hot happiness bean and leaf water on the reg. V happy with dis purchase. Just buy one. You probably dont need it, but you will love it."

reviews.reviewTitle: Water level window is pure plastic! Return
reviews.reviewText: "Water level window is pure plastic! The new research shows the BPA free plastics release other unhealthy elements in hot water. Plastic is plastic, will return. In addition, very cheap looking, doubt it s true stainless steel."

Other hot water kettles have many good features (e.g., selection of temperature) but they are larger and awkward to use.  Although this is a small kettle with only one temperature setting, we now use it instead of our large kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great. We replaced a 15 year old hot shot ...
reviews.reviewText: "Works great. We replaced a 15 year old hot shot and this kettle has improved our lives greatly. So easy to heat up and pour water, and we havent cleaned it yet but it seems easy to clean when we need to. Weve used it for a little over a week about 4 times per day and love it."

reviews.reviewTitle: I have a stovetop drip coffee pot and I love being able to have my boiling water so quickly ...
reviews.reviewText: "Dont know how I did without this pot?  I have a stovetop drip coffee pot and I love being able to have my boiling water so quickly to pour over the grounds.  Wonderful!  Also it is great to not have to be a slave to hoping the hot water comes out of my tap when I need it for various kitchen activities."

I decided to get rid of my Keurig coffee maker and go French Press.  Bought this to heat my water for my coffee, and I love it. Simple to use and clean with great safety features.  You can’t go wrong with this product.

For the price, this product does its job well. I can turn on my tea kettle, get ready for work (1 hour later).....the tea kettle turns off on its own when hot enough and is still pouring out hot water.  Very easy to clean and it comes with very clear instructions.

reviews.reviewTitle: "if youre a lefty hard to fill"
reviews.reviewText: "*For the price* this is a good teakettle. Its pretty simple to operate. Feels a little flimsy but again, for the price Im not complaining. Also the viewport is only on one side, so if youre left handed its annoying to fill it and not be able to see if its at the max fill line."

"Love this electric kettle-not sure how I have gone this long without one. It is super fast, you can tell when it boils, so if you dont want your water that hot, you can take it off sooner. Automatically shuts off if you left the room and forgot. Easy to pour, clean and use. Love this!!!"

"Ive been using this kettle for 8 months (purchased early July 2018). This kettle gets used multiple times per day in my home and its still going strong!", I recommend boiling some Apple Cidar Vinegar to remove all that limescale that gets built up. You could also hand wash the inside of the Kettle.

"My wife and I were in a rental property in Florida that had a heat it on the hob steel kettle that took ages to boil.  We ordered this kettle and it was delivered very promptly.  It is light, stable, and highly efficient - so we packed it and took it home!"
Works fine. Little noisy and gets hot. But, gets work done.

I love the simplicity and the size.  We have a 1.5 liter from another brand, that my wife likes because it lights up and is pretty.  I like this one for the opposite reason.  No bells and whistles, but solid performance and a space-saving design (I use mine at work).  Great price as well!

reviews.reviewTitle: For the price, a pretty great kettle
reviews.reviewText: "Im a college student and honestly, the kettle did everything I expect it to, which makes hot water. Caution: the water it makes is incredibly hot, which for me is good because I can mix it with cold water to make more hot water."

I love the smaller size!  1 liter instead of 1.7., "With 1500 watts it heats up super quickly.  When I looked at the other smaller electric kettles they were all between 1000 and 1100 watts.  Wonderful price as well, I couldnt be more pleased."

"Its simple, lightweight, small and exceeds performance expectations. Its great for a quick pour over coffee. We take it with us when we travel so we can get a decent cup of coffee in our hotel. A bag of coffee and the cone thingy and civilization can be yours."

I love this tea kettle!! The water heats up very fast and no more using the microwave a couple of times. It’s so simple to use and heats up much faster than a stove top kettle. This is my new best appliance and will buy again and definitely recommend to my friends.

Works great.  It heats up water much faster than I anticipated.  I do wish it was smaller, as the "minimum" water level is 0.5 liters.  Admittedly, I\ll often use this with a mere 8oz of water in there without problems, but I\m sure there\s some safety mechanism I\m bypassing by doing this.  Affordable, sleek-looking, fast-heating device.
The kettle boils water fast. It has a nice wide window for checking the water level., It has a thoughtful rubber patch on the cap to avoid burns. It would be better if the patch can be made larger.

I don’t know how I could leave a lengthy review. You put water in it, press the lever down, and then you get hot water. It’s fairly loud before the water starts boiling but that’s expected. The click of the lever when it gets to temp is plenty loud to hear for me.

"I went through two of the huge glass electric kettles before I settled on this little guy.  I live alone and this holds the perfect amount for my French press coffee (or tea) in the morning .Ive had it for several weeks and no problem with operation (it turns off at boil).  Compact and cute!"

"Pretty good for the price.  We bought this kettle to boil water for our babys formula.  Water boils quickly and stays warm for a bit.  However, the kettle leaves the water tasting like metal if left in kettle for more than half the day."
Compact and easy to use.  Works great - quick to boil the water - small/short enough to fit in the deep cabinet drawer so countertops stay clear and uncluttered.  Excellent item for the cost.
We use this kettle for making our water every morning for coffee. We fill it probably every other day. Lasted maybe 40 uses before the top started getting stuck then it broke off completely.

This kettle works great. I was surprised because it looked smaller than I thought. I drink a lot of tea during the day, and I have to fill this often. However, it functions very well. Auto shut off, base is sturdy, and plug solid.

This is a mid size basic kettle. It automatically turns on and off. It’s used a couple times a day and works just fine. The large top opening makes it easy to clean. The sides get hot so only hold it by the plastic handle but that’s about the same as any other kettle. It works fine and was inexpensive

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the handiest gadgets in your kitchen
reviews.reviewText: "Looks neat, great size (1 liter and fits in shorter cabinets) and just works... perfectly simple. An electric kettle is one of those conveniences you dont miss until you dont have one. Perfect accessory for anyone that prefers a French press for coffee :)"

"I was hoping for a way to heat some water for a cup of tea and not use the microwave.  My wife was skeptical about the purchase until we used it for the first time.  Its really fine, quick and easy.  Weve used it many times per day for nearly a year."
Nice pot. Heats water fast. Love that it is stainless steel easy to clean and unbreakable.  When water is heating you cannot open lid. Good safety feature. Love it for tea and other hot beverages.
First use was its last - plastic view window melted and leaked. Utterly unusable - made one cup of tea with the remaining water that hadn’t spilled out and chucked this terrible kettle in the trash.

reviews.reviewTitle: Toss out your stovetop tea kettle. You need this!
reviews.reviewText: When I was in Europe, we had one of these electric tea kettles and I knew I needed one for home. I had a regular one but got tired of turning the stove on to make a cup of tea. This one takes up very little space and is super easy to use. Would highly recommend.

So far so good. I bought this for the real estate office I work at. I wanted to have tea in the winter and I thought it would be nice for everybody to be warmer on the cold days. We’ve had it for a month now and it still working well.

Love this little hot water kettle.  So fed up with nuking every cup when I wanted some tea or coffee.  It is perfect for my use.  Kinda small, but OK for me.  Maybe a bigger one for a family situation.  Boils fast and hot.  Good deal.

I like this kettle better than my previous white kettle.  It does a great job but the power button being located on the bottom under the handle is a bit hard to see.  Otherwise it is fantastic so far, I have only used it for a couple months.
"This is such a sleek kettle and the perfect size. Boils very quickly. Im super happy with this purchase (and I am a picky buyer)"

reviews.reviewTitle: Zero to a hunnid real quick
reviews.reviewText: "I love love love Amazons Basic Stainless Steel Electric kettle, it goes zero to a hunnid real Quick, gets the job done in the blink of an eye. Im so glad I settled on this one when I went searching for a kettle. Great buy"

Going good after almost 2years of everyday usage. Even if I may need only a mug of hot water most of the times, I always fill upto the minimum water level marking., 4 stars due to the noise it makes. Otherwise clearly 5 stars. And don’t touch the body on the sides when it has boiled water.
This was a gift for my mom when her old electric kettle gave out. She was having to heat water on the stove to pour in her instant coffee. This makes her life so much better, Thanks.

I like this kettle.  It serves its purpose at a great price.  The only con is that when the water heats up the machine gives off a strange smell - something like a burnt rubber smell maybe.  People in my office have commented on it, so it’s pretty strong.  Still, it’s half the price of the best kettle it’s size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this water kettle. It is so quick to use
reviews.reviewText: Hard to clean in the inside though, because it says not to get the outside wet. That is so weird and hard to use. Otherwise, works as advertised. happy with the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: "I feel like Im making boiling water correctly"
reviews.reviewText: PROS, 1. Heats up water quickly., 2. Holds enough water for 4 big cups of tea or coffee., 3. Cleans up easily., "4. Its compact and doesnt take up much space on the counter.", CONS, 1. None so far., "Its easier and quicker than a teapot on the stove. I use it to make coffee in my french press and I havent noticed any metallic taste in the water.  I really like this a lot."

"This is the perfect hot pot for our use whihc is making single cups of coffee. Basic is an apt description, no bells and whistles, but none are needed. Would it be nice to have adjustable temp settings and a bit more capacity, maybe on occasion. Would it be worth the extra bucks? No!"
I really like this pot....it heats quickly, easy "as pie" to clean and store.  So much better than heating the stove (and the kitchen) to boil water.  Great for a quick cuppa.  Highly recommend.
"A great tea kettle that Ive already used a dozen times in a few days. Its smaller than I expected, but works wonderfully and Im enjoying it. Automatic shutoff is a good safety feature."

reviews.reviewTitle: It works well, seems like a classic, and is not expensive.
reviews.reviewText: Looked at every available cordless electric kettle---there are many!---and decided on this one because it looked just right for function and size (1.2 L). I considered some flashier-looking ones, but ended up choosing this simple one that blends in and am glad I did.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does a decent job, but reeeeeally loud.
reviews.reviewText: Pro: great price for a kettle., "Con: takes a while, and is EXTREMELY loud. Like, power drill loud. I bought this to take to my office, but its so loud, I couldnt think of taking it in, because its so loud and takes so long to heat up."
Extremely great price and the quality is great too
"Its nothing terribly special, but it gets the job done.  It looks nice on the counter and works as expected.  It would be nice if it wasnt quite so loud when heating water.  Otherwise, nice unit."

"Great kettle, its small and light weight, good for seniors and those who dont need the huge 1/7 liter taking up so much space. It has just a bit shorter cord than my old one, so it just barely reaches the only plug. What I dont like is that the pot turns off immediately when it comes to boil instead of hard boiling like my old one did,  so my coffee gets cold quickly. I have to hold the button down for a few seconds more so the water is the right temperature. It heats up fast though, its powerful for being a small kettle. Id give it 5 stars if it heated the water a bit hotter."

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Product exactly as described. I needed to replace the one in my office. This was exactly what I was looking for. No frills. Perfect for the price. Heats up quickly. Easy to clean.
Boils water super fast. Great size, not too big or small, feels well made. Very pleased.

I love this kettle.  My husband and I love hot chocolate and hot tea in the winter.  For 2-3 people this kettle is perfect size.  It is very fast and so convenient to use.  I love that it shuts off automatically.

"Wanted a small electric kettle that works and that is what it is. Now to see if it A) Rusts, or B) stops working. If either happens Ill come back and add to my review. If not, its a 5 star rating from me :)"
A fantastic small kettle for a person who makes a cup of tea on the odd occasions or needs to build water every now and again. Small, compact, efficient and neat great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great kettle but gets quite hot on the outside surface.
reviews.reviewText: "I like the look and know now not to touch the kettle surface after it heats up. I recommend it for the look, size and function, but dont recommend it for a household with kids."

This little kettle is a workhorse in our house! We love the size, shape, and look. Low profile and stainless steel fit great in the kitchen. The 1L size if great for making tea or coffee for 3-4 people, and water boils very quickly. Easy to operate with just one simple button.

"Its has a smaller capacity than most, but it works well.  It lights up when on, and has a safety shut-off that switches the teapot off if you dont pick it up within a few seconds of boiling.  Both of these are good features."

This is a very good product for your goals of drinking tea every day without warming your water in the microwave or had to deal with a teapot.  I liked pretty much everything, is super practical, however I wish it was easier to clean...other than that I think is great!

Bought for a cheap option in the office and it has worked smoothly. I like that there is only minimal plastic to gauge water levels (not sure if it is BPA free or not). It has worked well and a great price point, so I just bought another as a hosting gift for my aunt and uncle.
"Its great and the right size for what we need. It is dedicated to our baby, to clean toys while is hot, and to drink with meals.  May be too small for tea parties."
The  steamer has a coating that makes it easy to clean. Works great to steam milk for my lattes. The kids have used it to make their hot chocolate.

I bought couple from Costco with glass and both start leaking after 60 days from the rubber on the top that separating the glass from the lid, this was half of the price and by far more superior quality.
"First time I ever owned an electric kettle and Im very glad to have purchased this one.  Its great.  Easy to use.  Heats up quickly and no problem to fill.  Excellent purchase."

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for two or three and smart looking too.
reviews.reviewText: "Just the right size for two people who want the occasional hot chocolate or cup of tea.  It heats super fast, looks very nice on the counter and is fairly quiet.  Were very pleased with this purchase."
This kettle has sped up my morning routine considerably. Great for tea or for getting a jump on porridge or boiling eggs because it boils water so quickly. Looks nice in kitchen as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: It Makes a Nice Cup of Tea
reviews.reviewText: "For the price Amazons Kettle is worth it for a single person.  I just wish it was thicker to hold the heat in longer ... but no problem I just reheat when I want another cup of tea!"

"Kind to premature to say, but so far, the type of kettle that those the job. Affordable, stylish, minimalist and hopefully durable. Cord has the right length, 1 Liter capacity and doesnt take much space."

"One of the smartest purchases you can make this year. If you dont already have an electric kettle, and you drink a lot of tea, go get this one. Water boils in record time, and the device automatically shuts off once the water has reached full boil. It holds enough for two generous cups."
After about a month, I realized there was rust on the inside bottom. Yuck!

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what we were looking for
reviews.reviewText: We use this kettle many times a week. My 11 and 13yos use it easily and I feel comfortable with them doing so. I prefer them to use this electric kettle vs. our gas stove.

"I heat water every time I make my dogs food (eats a dehydrated dog food) and this is so easy to push a button and a min later i have hot water ready to go for his food. I love the size and quickness"

reviews.reviewTitle: Everyone who wants hot water should get one!
reviews.reviewText: "This is great! Its a good price, heats up water quickly, and is holding up well. I wish I bought it years ago! I have a fairly good size mug and can get almost 3 fills of hot water. I think its great!"

"It does what its supposed to do. It heats the water to boiling. On occasion I feel like it didnt shut off until well after the whole kettle was boiling, but it did shut off. I also live at a higher elevation which may affect that."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great basic electric hot water kettle, boils FAST
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to buy an inexpensive electric water kettle because I was tired of boiling water in a pot. Works great, boils really fast!! Nothing else to add.

This was a gift for my daughter-in-law, who likes a cuppa in the evening. It heats so fast and is unobtrusive in her decor--she loves it. My son speeds up the process of making boxed mac-n-cheese and doing other cooking chores requiring hot water. Great for busy parents!

"Girlfriend says: This is my first kettle and I absolutely love it. I cant believe how fast it boils the water! Easy to clean, easy to use, no defects or weird smells. Does exactly what its supposed to for a good price."
The hot water heater for the house stopped working and I needed something small as a stopgap measure until a new one could be installed. This is a perfect little hot water kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: I have too much fun with this.
reviews.reviewText: "Id take this kettle over a teapot any day. Heats up water super fast for tea. We use it every day with no issues. Highly recommend."

This is an excellent little kettle, especially for the money. It boils water very fast and holds enough for a couple of large mugs. All stainless steel and no exposed parts inside it. I’ve been using it for only a couple of weeks, so can’t speak to its longevity, but am very satisfied so far.

Boils a full pot incredibly fast!  Small footprint on the kitchen counter.  Got rid of the Keurig and replaced with this and a coffee press by Secura - clean, hot, rich delicious coffee every morning.  No longer waiting for the kettle to whistle for tea either - great product!!
Excellent item for small amounts of hot water. Looks clean and easy to wash too.
I love this! I add water at night, in morning turn it on and take dogs for quick walk.. bam! Hot water!!! Why did I wait so many years to get one???

reviews.reviewTitle: It quit working after a few uses.
reviews.reviewText: This kettle quit working after a few uses. It worked pretty well before it died suddenly. I returned it and will spend a few extra bucks on a tea kettle that lasts longer than a week.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality kettle that ends the corded problems when pouring
reviews.reviewText: Bought one of these for home and just got another one for the summer place.  Love the ability to remove the kettle from its base for pouring (I had another model that needed to be unplugged to pour). Well made, heats quickly and relatively quietly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes 4 cups of water in about 1 minute. Faster than a tea kettle.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my sister. We used distilled water to avoid sediment from our city water. We love it so much that I am buying one for me.

Pros:, -heats water quickly, -great water visibility for water line in measurement window, Cons:,  -Very loud when heating water, -Lid does not open all the way making filling it tricky, Have been using it for 1 week. Overall happy with the product except for design flaws with the lid and noise issue.
Heats water quickly with auto shut off, very nice clean look. small/compact but large enough to have a few cups of water ..great buy

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality product for a very reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Awesome, awesome, awesome product! I have been looking for a meta electric kettle for a while now, but I just never wanted to jump the gun and spend over $30. This thing holds about two cups more than needed to fill my French press, and heats up pretty fast.
I bought this to use at the school I work at to make coffee and oatmeal. It heats very quickly and makes the water very hot.
This kettle was easy to plugin and use right away. Takes a short amount of time to heat water for tea, coffee, oatmeal and more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great, boils water fast. I highly recommend it.
reviews.reviewText: I love love love this kettle. I bought it to put near my desk so I could make tea. A full pot of water boils in less than 3 min. I highly recommend this product. It looks good and is very good quality. I recommended this pot to a number of my friends.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple basic electric hot water kettle!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one for office and soon after one for home...  turns itself off when desired temperature for tea is reached.  Safe and simple.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great price, gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: Wish there was no plastic in contact with the water but the plastic window area is pretty small. It is terrific for the price. Heats water quickly. Is fairly quiet. Seems safe when using.

Excellent product! Not too heavy, not too tall, has a wide enough mouth that you can reach thorough to clean. The Goldilocks of kettles. Filling up to the lowest level (500 ml) is sufficient for 2 cups. 2 minutes, 30 seconds to bring 500 ml to boil.
"Im so glad I came across this kettle you fill it plug it up and done heats up very quickly you dont have to worry about the water boiling out because it shuts off automatically very good buy"

reviews.reviewTitle: The saving grace of my uni days
reviews.reviewText: "My roommate and I both use this kettle about twice a day, and it is the one thing keeping us sane. Its really quiet when it boils, so Ive been able to brew a cuppa tea at 6 in the morning and it hasnt woken anyone up. It takes about two minutes to start boiling, then it switches off immediately. It doesnt stay heated throughout the day and is about completely cooled off in about 10 minutes. 10/10 recommend for everyone"
I will use it every day to make hot drinks. Great price better than WMart and fast shipping. Highly recommend. Thank you.
Nothing to dislike!  Attractive, Heats fast  and a small footprint on the counter.  Doing away with our energy eating instahot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Boiling water in 3 minutes and 43 seconds!
reviews.reviewText: I love it! Love it! Love it! It is genuinely a fantastic purchase! I wish that I bought one of these years ago. It is so much faster than a coffee maker.
Kettle arrived on time in great packaging. It holds 1 liter of water. It took only 4 minutes to boil the water (I use alkaline water by the way). Great quality. So far, happy with the product.

reviews.reviewTitle: So simple to use! Quick and safe!
reviews.reviewText: "I use it for hot tea upstairs. Its so simple to use and it shuts off on its own. The bottom part does not heat up the surface. Quicker and easier than a tea kettle or microwave! Very lightweight, too!"
"I like this product, doesnt hold much but it does the job, it fits into a small space, and its an attractive piece to look at"

reviews.reviewTitle: a small cup of water boils in like 30 seconds
reviews.reviewText: a small cup of water boils in like 30 seconds, I boil water in here first and then pour it in the pot to save time also.
Boils water. What more do I need to say? I drink a quart of tea a day. How do I make so much tea?! I boil the water and steep it. Then I boil it again.
"Its a very nice little tea kettle.  I use it every day multiple times a day.  It boil water very quickly.  the right size for an personal use.  It makes 2 large cups of tea."
"As a no frills, basic electric kettle, this one is very nice  All ad claims are true, and the low price is also nice."
"Needed something to heat water for my tea at work. This works great. Heats water very quickly. Doesnt take up much room. Couldnt be happier."
"I have this in my office where I make at least two kettles daily of tea.  I love it, its just right and not a danger to have laying around a pretty messy office.  FAST heating."

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Bought for use in my office for a snack area. Burned out two expensive teapots. So have this one a try. It works well and has lasted much longer than others we’ve bought.

reviews.reviewTitle: Developed rust ring after 3 weeks of use
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this kettle, but returned it after it developed a rust ring along the inside bottom seam after 3 weeks of use.
I was ok with it until I started seeing small white particles and residues appear. And I don’t know if it is ok to drink or not. Changed the water from Arrowhead, Acquafina, Neatle and Dasani
heats water fast and is well made. water boils within a few minutes. no more standing at the stove waiting and waiting...

reviews.reviewerName: The Mystic Eye Of The Hipster
reviews.reviewText: "Im extremely pleased with the superior materials, & the fact that the heating element is not directly exposed to the water. (An exposed heating element can leach metals into the water.)", Attractive to look at , & heats the water fast., I like it,

reviews.reviewTitle: Works good according to my college student
reviews.reviewText: "He said it boils water like its supposed to. LOL", Not very helpful but he would complain if it sucked. Great for dorm.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it! Perfect size and great quality
reviews.reviewText: "Im a heavy tea drinker. I wanted a small appliance and this is the best one on Amazon. Works great, boils water fast and its stainless steel! Better thank other plastic brands. Totally recommend it. Amazon Basics is doing a great job!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for everyone who loves tea
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly. Gets a bit loud when working but that is pretty standard with these. Makes water for my tea in a flash and is super useful. I also use it to boil water to put in my pots when I boil water on the stove, it does it much faster.

Heats fast. Perfect for hot water use. However I was recommended to buy this for raising the humidity in my room for Lash extensions, and it shuts off too soon to be used for humidity purposes, but great for tea, coffee or when you need extremely hot water !

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this thing.  Trucking game changer.
reviews.reviewText: Works great!!! We use this in our 18 wheeler to make our coffee and tea.  Water gets extremely hot.  No more expensive nasty truck stop coffee.

"I bought one for my daughter to take to college. Its perfect! Nice, compact design. Capacity us about 3 large mugs worth. Heats water in less than a minute! Loved it so much that I bought another for myself!"

reviews.reviewTitle: I don’t like it.... I love it.
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect little electric kettle. I have my on my desk at work and use it three times a day on average and have had zero issues. I’ve had it for about a month. Highly recommend if if you need a small kettle for the office, camper, or if you just don’t need a full sized one at home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, convenient and easy to use...
reviews.reviewText: Perfect pot for brewing French press coffee...boils a full kettle of water in under 4 mins and holds exactly the right amount of water for our needs.
Perfect size and capacity.  Easy to use and clean.  Perfect temperature.  Was shipped fast and well protected. Works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it is recommended, fast heat and so easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Love it, I bought it bec. I’m a tea lover. And now I don’t need to make it in a microwave which is unhealthy. Is so easy to use. Heats so fast. Is recomended!!
This makes water so much faster than a kettle on the stove or in the microwave.  Easy to operate and easy to pour, this makes it quick and easy to heat water for tea or hot chocolate!

reviews.reviewTitle: "Great value! Looks great, works great, a little hard to clean but thats ok"
reviews.reviewText: "Works great, looks great. My hands are medium womens glove size, but I find it a little difficult to get my hand inside with a sponge to clean it... but since Im only boiling water, I am not having to do this often. Maybe use a brush or make your kid clean it"

reviews.reviewTitle: "but the design is awesome. Its quicker than the Costco one"
reviews.reviewText: "Holds just 1L of water vs. the 1.7L one we got from Costco, but the design is awesome. Its quicker than the Costco one. Price is right. And I dont hate the way it looks on my counter. A must buy if youre in the market for it."
I use this kettle everyday. It works great and I like it better than the clear glass ones I have had in the past.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats quickly, and perfect small size
reviews.reviewText: Nice small size, and if you do happen to need more, this unit heats up more quickly than any other that I have used. Nice price. Wish it were made in US, but none are.

reviews.reviewTitle: The exterior looks very nice and stylish
reviews.reviewText: The exterior looks very nice and stylish. After my first use, I realized that the exterior got very hot because of the boiling water. It will be ok to use; however, the lid can get too hot to close when you refill cold water for next boiling. Not really recommended, and the price is just alright.

"Been using for a bout a month now, pretty satisfied, really good, shipping was fast, it even has a filter which I didnt catch at first so that was a nice surprise, also stainless steel is def better than plastic and pretty cheap and look expensive. Would recommend and buy again"
Works perfectly. I use it to heat water for my French press. Some others have said that they noticed a metallic taste to the water after using this kettle, but I haven’t had that issue.
I love this little guy! We do the French press everyday and this is so easy and quick! I’ve brought it on several trips too which has been so convenient.
I returned this because it is too small, looks kinda crappy made and seems to just sell because Amazon pushes it. You can get a better made water kettle for a few dollars more.
"Doesnt hold as much as my previous pot but I dont need as much as I thought.  Heats quickly and efficiency."

I love the speed of heating. I like that I can carry the pot to the table for serving because of you can easily detach from the heating element., "I have noticed some small rusting spots that I didnt expect to see in stainless steel."
"Its perfect for my little apartment. I didnt want a big kettle, so this 1L is great. The outside really heats up though, so if you accidentally touch it after its heated the water itll hurt."
Easy to use. Makes boiling in about a minute. self shut off is the best feature. This lid does not open all the way making it hard to get inside and clean out.
"Really like this. The switch and top are such that you never will burn yourself. I dont fill it up since I just make tea for myself, but its very fast."

"This is the loudest water boiler I have ever experienced. This water boiler sounds like a spacecraft jet engine taking off from the inside of an erupting volcano next to the speaker stack at an Above & Beyond ABGT500 aircannon bass drop. I would know because this is routinely my flightplan for taking off from my top secret moon io volcano crime layer. I turned this boiler thing on in the kitchen at work and my vision turned into tomb raider shakey cam. People in the other room were running into the kitchen and getting sick asking if everything was OK. One guy was straight up doing the turtle crab crouch under his desk like it was an earthquake drill. My boss seemingly hovered in at the last second on queue like it was a Michael Bay script and everybody got sucked into a time dilation black hole. Ive never heard a longer or deeper scream of Noooooooooooooo in my life. Suffice it to say Im not allowed to make tea anymore so Im really trying to appreciate this one hot cup of ceylon."
I don’t like that it’s kinda difficult to clean, I get a little spooked getting water near the outside. Other than that? Absolutely LOVE everything about it. I use it at least once a day.

I love that this is so convenient and heats water to be burning hot so insanely fast, BUT it is metal and I accidentally touched my hand to it and it was scorching hot! Wouldn’t recommend if you have young kids who could reach it or if you have a messy kitchen with things that could melt nearby!

reviews.reviewTitle: "After two broken glass kettles, Ive found the one."
reviews.reviewText: "If youre regularly heating ~.5l of liquid or less, this is your kettle. Its a lot more compact than the $35 glass kettles on amazon and because its entirely metal, it heats very quickly. Overall, I really like the design."
Love the size and design.  Very fast to boil water and then automatically shuts off.  Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this pot, great product at good price!I
reviews.reviewText: I love this pot, it’s so quick and easy and I do not have to worry about accidentally leaving kettle on anymore!
Best money ever spent.  We use this hot pot all during the day.  The water heats so quickly and fills and rinses quickly.  We are totally satisfied with this product.
Nice small kettle. Looks good . Does not take up much counter space., Small and quite noisy

"The lid does not come off, it just tilts back a bit. You cant get your hand in. I used a bottle mop to get in. Pretty poor quality and it just holds 1L, just enough for 1 pot in the French press coffee maker or small bits of tea.."

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast, but too loud. Needs a louder done signal.
reviews.reviewText: "I like the fast heating of water. But I dont like that the sound when heating is too loud. I listen for the reduction in noise when the water has reached the boiling point. A special signal sound would be helpful."
perfect small-ish size. my old one was 1.75 liters and this is way better for 2-4 people, unless you want to pre-boil your pasta water or something. works great and looks nice!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and boils quickly
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use and boils so quickly!, I am that weirdo that only drinks instant coffee and this is a lifesaver! No weird smell or taste after water has been boil
Heats water very fast. Before storing, I make sure it is completely dry. I place it upside down with lid open in my dish rack. Since I only use it a few times a week or less.
it is god for small commercial substance. does the job, but not if you use it alot based on its encumbered size. keeps the water pretty hot for a decentt time after the fact. Never cleaned it yet.
This kettle did a great job quickly heating water.  The problem is that the lid broke off in less than a year.

We bought this for a trip to boil water. It did heat u the water very quickly while it lasted but within just a few uses it completely stopped working. The light would come on but it would not generate any heat. Junk.
Small, compact, cheap, and effective. Wife was looking for a smaller kettle to fit on her desk in her work office. This was a great option that has worked out well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good price for a solid kettle
reviews.reviewText: "Purchased this so I didnt have to heat water in the micro.  Works great, the base material is a bit cheap, but for the price its acceptable."

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought a kettle at Costco and it died on ...
reviews.reviewText: "I bought a kettle at Costco and it died on me in less than a month. This one has last about a month and a half and still going. It is small, but does its job."
"Its a good looking little kettle, works as expected. Cant really fault it for anything."
perfect for 1 or 2, hot water at your fingertips in moments!  need a little warm-up?  no problem, just quickly reheat, and add some more hot water to your cuppa!
"Works great. I prefer this to my teapot on the stove. Much faster and I dont worry if I forgot to turn off the stove."
Arrived on time, perfect for water.  Auto shut off when water boils.  Keep an eye on pot when using anything but water...will overflow.
just stopped abruptly.....then will pick up again days later. could not just regulate anymore
This thing is a beast! I use this every day and love it. It heats up very quickly, is easy to use, and the stainless steel gives it a high quality look and feel.
This was a cute kettle and if it’s just for you and no guests it will be perfect. I did actually return it based on size.
"I really like this kettle, it boils water lickity-split!  Its got solid functioning and will turn off when the water gets to a rolling boil."
It works fast. The only problem is that the exterior warms dangerously. If this could be fixed it would be perfect.
It’s great for what it is. Put water in it, turn it on and in about 60 seconds you have boiling water.
This is exactly what I needed. Warms the water quick and looks great on my countertop.
This is awesome. Small enough to fit in my kitchen and heats up much quicker than a kettle on the stove. Would definitely recommend!
Lovely kettle for my morning cuppa. Pretty on my kitchen bench. Good price. Heats quickly.
"Excellent works fabbbb this is the 2nd bought this is a gift as its so good"
"Its a little disappointing that this is only for right handed consumers and there is no clear indication when the water is done boiling except for a click of the tab you press down."
"I use this at work and its perfect. This isnt like my last one which had coils at the bottom. Its flat!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Great kettle at a great price
reviews.reviewText: "Ive had this for a few months now and I use it daily sometimes twice a day and have had no issues. For the price you really cant beat it."
I use to boil a pot of water on the stove for tea. Took what seemed like forever. This thing is boiling and ready in maybe 60-90 seconds. Amazing. Perfect for tea lovers.
I really wished I had this back in college - a great, fast way to hot water - soups - noodles - tea - whatever.  Just took with me on a trip for several weeks and it was more than worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works quickly, great safety features! Easy to clean. Follow directions!
reviews.reviewText: Nothing I didn’t like about this!
I bought this to go with my Mira French Press.  This pot works wonderfully.  It gets water to a boil in just a few minutes, and then shuts its self off. Magic!  I love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils water quick and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Used this at an Airbnb and it was so convenient I knew I had to get one of my own. Boils water in like a minute or two and it was $20 bucks. Perfect.
Heats very fast, love how compact it is. Good but basic styling. Really like the side “window “ so you can see how full and when boiling.
Works great, we’ve been using it for about 3 months now. I did 4 stars for cleaning because it would be difficult to clean but since you should only use water it’s fine.
"Just a simple hot water pot. As basic as it gets. When it breaks Ill go with one that has more bells and whistles. But for now it does the job quickly and fairly quietly."

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats water fast, easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: "I ordered this kettle to heat water for our water pick device because of my wifes teeth are sensitive to cold. I found it not only works for this it works for heating water for my tea. Its fast and easy to clean just what you want in a kettle."
I took too long to finally buy this.  It has made a tremendous difference and is a great timesaver.
I drink a lot of hot tea and using the stove to heat water gets old. This little guy works great, saves energy and heats fast. I love it.
Straight forward, looks and works well, heats water quickly.  Would buy again.
I love how cute this little kettle is. It heats up water super fast. So glad I got it and will recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Most used product in the house!
reviews.reviewText: We drink a lot of tea and we put this kettle on several times a day. Its quick, safe and easy to use. Love it!

Good kettle. Heats fast, turns off quickly. My one complaint is with the filter provided, for pouring - the plastic hold tabs broke when I tried to remove the filter and now it, is useless. No big deal though. The kettle was a good purchase.
Absolutely love it!!!, Compact, heats up fast, Nice looking ! Been using it for months - No issue

reviews.reviewTitle: The little water heater that could!
reviews.reviewText: Cute, cheap, good quality. It heats water way faster than any of my other kettles, in part probably due to the small size. Love it.
It works fine, wish it had more temp control or the ability to change the temp at all but it does make water hot as it should.
It works well, but the bottom (inside) immediately stained. I still use it, but it makes me question the quality.

"Excellent electric kettle. I dont make tea for an army, so much of the other good looking options were way too big for me. This simple, easy model from AmazonBasics is everything I could ask for. Highly recommended."
Works great, cheap and attractive. The heating element is not in the main water chamber unlike the cheapest walmart options but sealed underneath. Great buy
Very happy with this unit so far. Have boiling water very quick and is just the right size for an older couple. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it at the beach house and needed one for home.
reviews.reviewText: "Love how fast it is, easy to clean with a wide opening., and is a great size.  We use it all the time.  Gets hot on the outside so we are careful.  Perfect for the price"
Bought it for our office kitchen. Works fast and dependable. Looks good and came at a very attractive price.
"You cant boil water on the stove as fast as this pot can. My family likes it so much we have started drinking tea on a regular basis."
Rapid boil. Piping hot beverages in minutes. Super fast boil. Had to buy two. One for home and another for the office. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like that level indicator outside
reviews.reviewText: Very slick.  I had to replace my other one as the bottom was getting corroded.  I like that level indicator outside.  And I am usually impressed with the Amazon Basics brand. :)
Live this quick pot. It heats my water in about two minutes. Great purchase.
My wife wanted a kettle to use in her "Garden Cottage" so it didn\t need to be too large. I ordered this one and she loves it. She says it heats up faster than the one in the house.
Works really well. It is hard to pour very accurately with the short spout.

reviews.reviewTitle: Functional, sleek, slim kettle that just works.
reviews.reviewText: This fits my need for fast boiling water perfectly.  I love the slim, modern design that’s perfect for small kitchens.  We have hard water where I live so even with water softener and filter, kettles do not last more than a few years.  So the price is great.  I highly recommend this.  It has basic functionality so no keep warm button and such.  It does the job.
Loved this little tea kettle.  You will have boiling water in less than a minute.  Perfect for hot chocolate and tea.
I use this kettle every day.  I use it to make coffee as oatmeal quicker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the water boiling which is all i need for some good tea.
reviews.reviewText: This thing was a savior when i was living in a room at my sister in laws house. It is kind of loud when warming up, but nothing unbearable. Gets the water boiling which is all i need for some good tea.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect pot for heating water for tea, etc.
reviews.reviewText: Love love love this hot pot. Can’t be without it. Use it daily. Nothing negative!
"Its a very elegant water boiler it looks  in stainless steel material and the design is very cute i love it, I would give 5 stars if  it was  made also to works with power supply 220 volts.."
The first two I bought broke in a very short time ! This one has lasted longer! I think it will last!! It has a different switch. Better quality!
"Works great. Nice and compact. Cant beat it for the price. I use it for travel."
I have been using this kettle for the last 1.5 years. No issues so far. I like that it boils water quickly, quicker than the stove.
This is a great little tea kettle, works well, shuts off, and heats up fast!! Very durable.
Although it makes a lot of noise it works just like I wanted and fast.  I can have a cup of hot chocolate very fast in the morning.
"Super cute and works great.Takes a few minutes and because the water gets so hot, I usually end up shutting it off earlier. No issues on overheating or melting that Ive read in other reviews."
This is a great  tea kettle for one person or smaller settings. Perfect size and heats water quickly.
Very happy with my purchase. Perfect in every way. If it gives me a couple of years of service I will thrilled.
"Good item and does what its supposed to do. Its small enough to fit on my small counter top."
I am British and I drink tea all day long. This kettle is quick to boil, easy to use, and is stylish, essential for hot tea whenever I want it. Love it!
This pot boils about three coffee cups of water in under four minutes. Amazing.
Love this kettle! My whole family uses it and loves it. Works great! I can have a nice hot cup of tea in minutes.
I bought this as a gift. It heats up fast and the automatic shutoff is a great feature.

Good product that works well. I do wish that the cover opened wider, but it is not a problem. Also wish that when it turns off automatically, that there was a loud beep that could heard from the next room.
This electric kettle works great! Heats up super fast, holds enough water for many cups of tea/coffee etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought this as a replacement to an older electric ...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement to an older electric kettle that started to leak. This is a little smaller, but still adequately holds the amount of liquid I generally need. It is quick to heat up and bring water to a boil.
"I bought this in February and loved its clean and compact shape. 8 months and Im still very happy. It boils quickly and the automatic shut off hasnt failed. Im ordering another!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for teapot.  Faster, safer and more energy efficient than old on the stove kettle.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size to fill my teapot.  So much faster and more energy efficient than the one I used on the stove.  And much safer as I bought this one to replace the one that boiled all the water out and actually started melting onto my burner.  Ruined my kettle and the burner not to mention was extremely dangerous.  Love that this one shuts off once it reaches boiling.
Yes, just what I needed. Simple, fast, affordable and it works.
This is an excellent pot; size is just right, quick heat and good temperature.  Glad to have found it.
It does its job quickly. Hot water almost on demand. Goodbye tea kettle on the gas stove.
"This is a great one-person personal water boiler. Its intuitive and easy to use and it gets the water hot fast. Very happy with this."
"Heats quickly but the exterior gets extremely hot so Im returning. Hope to do better with double walled kettle."
This kettle is so cute  excellent product nice safe and beautifuly design can compete with the other famous companies highly recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: Heat fast and well, without that plasticky smell
reviews.reviewText: Our last electric kettle was plastic and always smelled like hot plastic when used. It was very disturbing. This metal one has no scent at all and heats super fast. Very happy so far.

I like this hot water kettle because it is compact.  Our old one was much larger with a wide foot print.  This amazon basics one was a great replacement as it is smaller, taking up less room on the counter but still having a large water capacity.  The heating speed is fast.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes Really Good Hot Water! LOL
reviews.reviewText: Fast. Only takes it about 2 minutes to boil 18 oz of water.
Boils water very quickly.  Lid opens and closes without a problem.  Not much else to it.
Got this for brother’s dorm room! He loves it!
Fast boiling, easy to fill from refrigerator filtered water access.
I love this little kettle, and it is little. Part of why I love it. Perfect size for me to boil water for my French press. And it boils in under 2 mins.

reviews.reviewTitle: Too early to tell about durability and build quality
reviews.reviewText: I noticed a spec of rust on the "stainless Steel" but given the price might be expected.  Lid mechanism I think might end up being the weak link.  Looks fine and works great so far.

"I like it so much Im thinking of getting a second to keep in my office.  I particularly appreciate that the heating element isnt external, meaning that the plate doesnt radiate heat to the countertop, only to the pot.  It heats enough water to fill a standard teapot."
Much better than the other one we had.  Much sturdier!  Can not go wrong with AmazonBasics!!

I am a park ranger & live out of my camper van in the winter. It’s a bit older and I worry about co2 gas from the propane stove. I am incredibly impressed with this kettle. In no time, my frozen water was boiling hot for tea. This has made making hot beverages in the morning and evening super time efficient. Checking to see if this brand has an electric burner!
Great product.  Easy to use, easy to clean, fast kettle!
Awesome little kettle., Sleek and simple design., Small and functional., Exactly what I needed.
"Good kettle, look great on the kitchen counter. Some may think its a bit small."
Love this!!  Makes life easier. If I had known how much I was going to be using it, I would have looked for a bigger size
Love love love this kettle, it was a little smaller than I was expecting by t works great for my needs!
A good, curable item, heats water very quickly and is easy to clean due to the wide lid opening, also great price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the most durable, but price was right!
reviews.reviewText: "This little pot is great for heating up tea Water and doesnt take up too much space. Perfect for our tiny kitchen."

"doesnt hold as much water and i cant adjust the temperature like the last one i had, but unlike the last one this one is still working so there is that. not super fancy and slick or working amazingly but it heats up water to a boil at an acceptable rate."
Easy to use, automatic shut-off is great, easy to clean

reviews.reviewTitle: Small but does what it should.
reviews.reviewText: "This kettle is small but does its job pretty well. It doesnt take up a lot of space and heats up pretty quickly. The chord for the heating part is pretty short."
It looks good, sturdy and works. It also has a good shape and holds enough amount of water. But, it takes long time to boil water.
A bit smaller than anticipated, but in every other way an excellent kettle
